Body
Oct 30, 2022( Ticker Report: http://www.tickerreport.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 Curaleaf Holdings, Inc. (OTCMKTS:CURLF[1] - Get Rating[2]) has been assigned an average recommendation of 
"Moderate Buy" from the thirteen ratings firms that are presently covering the firm, MarketBeat.com[3] reports. Two 
equities research analysts have rated the stock with a hold recommendation and seven have issued a buy 
recommendation on the company. The average 12 month price objective among analysts that have updated their 
coverage on the stock in the last year is $15.50.  
Several research firms have issued reports on CURLF. BTIG Research reaffirmed a "buy" rating on shares of 
Curaleaf in a report on Friday. Cowen cut their target price on Curaleaf from $25.00 to $10.00 in a research report 
on Tuesday, August 9th. Canaccord Genuity Group decreased their price target on Curaleaf from C$14.50 to 
C$13.50 in a research report on Tuesday, August 9th. Finally, Alliance Global Partners dropped their price target on 
Curaleaf from C$15.00 to C$12.00 in a research note on Tuesday, August 9th. Curaleaf Stock Down 1.6 % CURLF 
stock[4] opened at $5.27 on Tuesday. The firm has a market cap of $3.24 billion and a PE ratio of -27.72. Curaleaf 
has a 12 month low of $4.48 and a 12 month high of $11.37. The company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.54, a 
current ratio of 2.44 and a quick ratio of 1.07. The firm has a 50 day simple moving average of $5.71 and a 200 day 
simple moving average of $5.75. Curaleaf Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) Curaleaf Holdings, Inc operates a 
cannabis operator in the United States. It operates in two segments, Cannabis Operations and Non-Cannabis 
Operations. The Cannabis Operations segment engages in the production and sale of cannabis through retail and 
wholesale channels. The Non-Cannabis Operations segment provides professional services, including cultivation, 
processing, and retail know-how and back-office administration, intellectual property licensing, real estate leasing 
services, and lending facilities to medical and adult-use cannabis licensees under management service 
agreements. See AlsoGet a free copy of the StockNews.com research report on Curaleaf (CURLF)[2]Will Demand

Oct 30, 2022( Zolmax.com: http://www.zolmax.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 Ryanair (NASDAQ:RYAAY[1] - Get Rating[2]) was downgraded by analysts at StockNews.com[2] from a "buy" 
rating to a "hold" rating in a report issued on Friday. 
Other research analysts also recently issued reports about the stock. Stifel Nicolaus downgraded shares of Ryanair 
from a "hold" rating to a "sell" rating in a research report on Wednesday, September 14th. Liberum Capital 
downgraded shares of Ryanair from a "buy" rating to a "hold" rating in a report on Wednesday, October 12th. UBS 
Group raised their price objective on shares of Ryanair from €19.20 ($19.59) to €21.00 ($21.43) in a report on 
Wednesday, August 10th. JPMorgan Chase & Co. cut their price objective on shares of Ryanair from €19.20 
($19.59) to €17.70 ($18.06) in a report on Monday, October 10th. Finally, Raymond James cut their price objective 
on shares of Ryanair from $112.00 to $102.00 and set a "strong-buy" rating for the company in a report on 
Wednesday, October 5th. One investment analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating, four have issued a hold 
rating, six have given a buy rating and one has given a strong buy rating to the company. According to data from 
MarketBeat, the stock has a consensus rating of "Moderate Buy" and an average target price of $47.87. Ryanair 
Price Performance Ryanair stock[3] opened at $67.86 on Friday. Ryanair has a twelve month low of $55.90 and a 
twelve month high of $127.25. The firm has a 50 day moving average price of $66.15 and a 200-day moving 
average price of $74.39. The company has a market capitalization of $15.43 billion, a P/E ratio of 62.83 and a beta 
of 1.44. The company has a quick ratio of 1.08, a current ratio of 1.08 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.59. Institutional 
Investors Weigh In On Ryanair Large investors have recently added to or reduced their stakes in the company. 
Harding Loevner LP bought a new stake in shares of Ryanair during the 1st quarter valued at about $48,000. 
Parallel Advisors LLC bought a new stake in shares of Ryanair during the 2nd quarter valued at about $64,000. 
Ronald Blue Trust Inc. bought a new stake in shares of Ryanair during the 2nd quarter valued at about $90,000. 
Migdal Insurance & Financial Holdings Ltd. boosted its stake in shares of Ryanair by 55.7% during the 1st quarter. 
Migdal Insurance & Financial Holdings Ltd. now owns 1,183 shares of the transportation company's stock valued at 
$100,000 after purchasing an additional 423 shares in the last quarter. Finally, Whittier Trust Co. of Nevada Inc. 
boosted its stake in shares of Ryanair by 656.4% during the 3rd quarter. Whittier Trust Co. of Nevada Inc. now 
owns 1,770 shares of the transportation company's stock valued at $103,000 after purchasing an additional 1,536 
shares in the last quarter. Institutional investors own 43.70% of the company's stock. Ryanair Company Profile (Get 
Rating[2]) Ryanair Holdings plc, together with its subsidiaries, provides scheduled-passenger airline services in 
Ireland, the United Kingdom, Italy, Spain, Germany, and other European countries. It is also involved in the 
provision of various ancillary services, such as non-flight scheduled and Internet-related services; in-flight sale of

(OTCMKTS:TTGPF)
Newstex Blogs

October 30, 2022 Sunday 6:06 AM EST
Copyright 2022 Newstex LLC All Rights Reserved
Length: 471 words
Body
Oct 30, 2022( Ticker Report: http://www.tickerreport.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 TT Electronics plc (OTCMKTS:TTGPF[1] - Get Rating[2]) - Analysts at Jefferies Financial Group dropped their 
FY2022 EPS estimates for TT Electronics in a research report issued to clients and investors on Thursday, October 
27th. Jefferies Financial Group analyst V. Jeffriess now forecasts that the company will post earnings per share of 
$0.18 for the year, down from their prior estimate of $0.19. Jefferies Financial Group has a "Hold" rating on the 
stock. The consensus estimate for TT Electronics' current full-year earnings is $0.20 per share. Jefferies Financial 
Group also issued estimates for TT Electronics' FY2022 earnings at $0.18 EPS, FY2023 earnings at $0.20 EPS, 
FY2023 earnings at $0.20 EPS, FY2024 earnings at $0.21 EPS and FY2024 earnings at $0.21 EPS.  
Separately, Peel Hunt cut shares of TT Electronics to a "buy" rating in a research report on Wednesday, August 
31st. TT Electronics Price Performance Shares of OTCMKTS TTGPF[3] opened at $1.99 on Friday. The company's 
fifty day moving average is $1.99 and its 200-day moving average is $2.10. TT Electronics has a twelve month low 
of $1.90 and a twelve month high of $4.00. TT Electronics Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) TT Electronics plc 
provides engineered electronics for performance critical applications in the automation and electrification, 
healthcare, and aerospace and defense markets worldwide. The company operates through three divisions: Power 
and Connectivity, Global Manufacturing Solutions, and Sensors and Specialist Components. Further ReadingGet a

 Paltalk, Inc. (OTCMKTS:PALT[1] - Get Rating[2]) fell 0.7% on Friday . The stock traded as low as $1.49 and last

volume of 301,922 shares. The stock had previously closed at $1.51. Analyst Ratings Changes Separately, Maxim

a negative return on equity of 10.49%. The company had revenue of $2.64 million for the quarter. Institutional

applications worldwide. The company offers consumer applications, which include Paltalk, Camfrog, and Tinychat

Body
Oct 30, 2022( Ticker Report: http://www.tickerreport.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 Crawford United Co. (OTCMKTS:CRAWA[1] - Get Rating[2])'s stock price was down 2.1% during mid-day trading 
on Friday . The company traded as low as $19.46 and last traded at $19.46. Approximately 300 shares were traded 
during mid-day trading, a decline of 65% from the average daily volume of 859 shares. The stock had previously 
closed at $19.88. Crawford United Trading Down 2.1 % The business has a 50 day simple moving average of 
$20.60 and a 200-day simple moving average of $22.47. The company has a current ratio of 1.80, a quick ratio of 
1.08 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.81. The stock has a market capitalization of $66.94 million, a price-to-earnings 
ratio of 19.08 and a beta of 0.60.  
Crawford United (OTCMKTS:CRAWA[1] - Get Rating[2]) last issued its quarterly earnings results on Wednesday, 
August 10th. The company reported $0.34 earnings per share (EPS) for the quarter, missing analysts' consensus 
estimates of $0.65 by ($0.31). Crawford United had a return on equity of 10.39% and a net margin of 3.00%. The 
business had revenue of $31.90 million during the quarter, compared to analyst estimates of $32.10 million. On 
average, equities analysts predict that Crawford United Co. will post 1.59 earnings per share for the current year. 
About Crawford United (Get Rating[2]) Crawford United Corp. is a holding company, which engages in developing 
and manufacturing products used by companies in the transportation and emissions testing industries. It operates 
through the following segments: Aerospace Components, Commercial Air Handling, and Industrial Hose. The 
Aerospace Components segment provides complete end-to-end engineering, machining, grinding, welding, brazing, 
heat treat, and assembly solutions. Recommended StoriesGet a free copy of the StockNews.com research report

 https://www.marketbeat.com/logos/quilter-plc-logo.pngQuilter (OTCMKTS:QUILF[1] - Get Rating[2]) had its target 
price reduced by JPMorgan Chase & Co.[3] from GBX 85 ($1.03) to GBX 83 ($1.00) in a research report report 
published on Thursday morning, The Fly[4] reports. 
Several other research analysts also recently weighed in on the company. Citigroup downgraded Quilter from a buy 
rating to a neutral rating in a research note on Wednesday, July 20th. Barclays dropped their price target on Quilter 
from GBX 120 ($1.45) to GBX 100 ($1.21) in a research report on Friday, July 15th. Finally, UBS Group dropped 
their price target on Quilter from GBX 145 ($1.75) to GBX 135 ($1.63) in a research report on Wednesday. One 
equities research analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating, five have assigned a hold rating and one has issued 
a buy rating to the company's stock. According to data from MarketBeat.com, the stock currently has a consensus 
rating of Hold and an average price target of $129.08. Quilter Price Performance Shares of OTCMKTS:QUILF[5] 
opened at $1.03 on Thursday. Quilter has a 12-month low of $0.95 and a 12-month high of $1.20. The business has 
a 50 day moving average of $1.11 and a two-hundred day moving average of $1.55. Quilter Company Profile (Get 
Rating[2]) Quilter plc provides advice-led investment solutions and investment platforms in the United Kingdom and 
internationally. It operates in two segments, High Net Worth and Affluent. The company offers financial advice for 
protection, mortgages, savings, investments, and pensions. It also provides Quilter Investment Platform, an 
investment platform for advice-based wealth management products and services; Quilter Investors, which offers 
investment solutions; and Quilter Financial Planning, a restricted and independent financial adviser network that 
provides mortgage and financial planning advice and financial solutions to individuals and businesses through a 
network of intermediaries. Read MoreGet a free copy of the StockNews.com research report on Quilter

company traded as high as $0.44 and last traded at $0.44. 50,700 shares were traded during mid-day trading, a

institutional investor owned 11,240 shares of the company's stock after selling 7,947 shares during the quarter. IFG 
Advisory LLC's holdings in iShares ESG Aware MSCI EM ETF were worth $363,000 as of its most recent SEC 
filing.

and a 12 month high of $42.75.

Oct 30, 2022( Ticker Report: http://www.tickerreport.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 Shares of Galp Energia, SGPS, S.A. (OTCMKTS:GLPEY[1] - Get Rating[2]) have been given an average 
recommendation of "Moderate Buy" by the eight research firms that are currently covering the stock, 
Marketbeat.com[3] reports. One investment analyst has rated the stock with a hold rating and four have given a buy 
rating to the company. The average 12-month target price among brokerages that have issued ratings on the stock 
in the last year is $12.73.  
A number of equities analysts have commented on the stock. Royal Bank of Canada decreased their price objective 
on shares of Galp Energia, SGPS from €14.00 ($14.29) to €13.50 ($13.78) in a report on Wednesday. Morgan 
Stanley reduced their price target on shares of Galp Energia, SGPS from €11.50 ($11.73) to €10.40 ($10.61) in a 
report on Thursday, October 20th. Galp Energia, SGPS Trading Up 1.2 % Shares of GLPEY[4] opened at $5.07 on 
Thursday. Galp Energia, SGPS has a 52 week low of $4.36 and a 52 week high of $6.88. The firm has a market 
cap of $8.41 billion, a price-to-earnings ratio of -507.00 and a beta of 0.70. The stock has a 50 day moving average 
of $5.05 and a 200-day moving average of $5.47. Galp Energia, SGPS Cuts Dividend The business also recently 
announced a dividend, which was paid on Wednesday, October 5th. Investors of record on Friday, September 23rd 
were issued a $0.0822 dividend. This represents a dividend yield of 3.21%. The ex-dividend date was Thursday, 
September 22nd. Galp Energia, SGPS's payout ratio is -1,600.00%. About Galp Energia, SGPS (Get Rating[2]) 
Galp Energia, SGPS, SA operates as an integrated energy operator in Portugal and internationally. The company 
operates through four segments: Upstream, Industrial & Energy Management, Commercial, and Renewables and 
New Business. The Upstream segment engages in the exploration, development, and production of hydrocarbons 
primarily in Brazil, Mozambique, and Angola. Read MoreGet a free copy of the StockNews.com research report on

 Shares of Hang Lung Properties Limited (OTCMKTS:HLPPY[1] - Get Rating[2]) reached a new 52-week low during 
trading on Friday . The company traded as low as $6.50 and last traded at $6.55, with a volume of 117540 shares 
changing hands. 
The stock had previously closed at $6.77. Hang Lung Properties Stock Performance The business's 50 day simple 
moving average is $8.24 and its 200 day simple moving average is $8.91. Hang Lung Properties Cuts Dividend The 
business also recently declared a dividend, which was paid on Monday, October 10th. Stockholders of record on 
Monday, September 12th were given a $0.1009 dividend. This represents a dividend yield of 5.58%. The ex-
dividend date of this dividend was Friday, September 9th. Hang Lung Properties Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) 
Hang Lung Properties Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the property investment, development, 
and management activities in Hong Kong and Mainland China. The company operates through Property Leasing 
and Property Sales segments. The company is involved in the development, sale, and leasing of properties. Further

 Shares of Globex Mining Enterprises Inc. (TSE:GMX[1] - Get Rating[2]) reached a new 52-week low during trading 
on Friday . The company traded as low as C$0.61 and last traded at C$0.62, with a volume of 136323 shares 
trading hands. 
The stock had previously closed at C$0.65. Globex Mining Enterprises Price Performance The business's 50-day 
moving average price is C$0.75 and its 200 day moving average price is C$1.01. The company has a quick ratio of 
158.80, a current ratio of 159.62 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.30. The company has a market capitalization of 
C$33.97 million and a P/E ratio of 2.77. About Globex Mining Enterprises (Get Rating[2]) Globex Mining Enterprises 
Inc engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in North America. It has a 
mineral portfolio of approximately 204 early to mid-stage exploration, development, and royalty properties 
containing base metals, including copper, nickel, zinc, and lead; precious metals, such as gold, silver, platinum, and 
palladium; specialty metals and minerals comprising manganese, vanadium, titanium oxide, iron, molybdenum, 
lithium, cobalt, scandium, and antimony, as well as rare earths and associated elements; and industrial minerals 
consisting of mica, silica, potassic feldspar, pyrophyllite, kaolin, talc, and magnesite. Featured StoriesWill Demand

5,590 Shares in JPMorgan US Quality Factor ETF (NYSEARCA:JQUA) 
Purchased by Avantax Advisory Services Inc.
Newstex Blogs 
Ticker Report
October 30, 2022 Sunday 12:06 PM EST
Copyright 2022 Newstex LLC All Rights Reserved
Length: 543 words
Body
Oct 30, 2022( Ticker Report: http://www.tickerreport.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 Avantax Advisory Services Inc. bought a new position in shares of JPMorgan US Quality Factor ETF 
(NYSEARCA:JQUA[1] - Get Rating[2]) in the 2nd quarter, according to the company in its most recent disclosure 
with the SEC. The fund bought 5,590 shares of the company's stock, valued at approximately $208,000.  
Several other hedge funds and other institutional investors have also modified their holdings of JQUA. TownSquare 
Capital LLC acquired a new stake in JPMorgan US Quality Factor ETF in the 1st quarter worth about $33,857,000. 
First Republic Investment Management Inc. acquired a new stake in JPMorgan US Quality Factor ETF in the 1st 
quarter worth about $27,088,000. Delta Investment Management LLC raised its stake in JPMorgan US Quality 
Factor ETF by 62.0% in the 1st quarter. Delta Investment Management LLC now owns 420,158 shares of the 
company's stock worth $18,016,000 after purchasing an additional 160,769 shares in the last quarter. Intelligence 
Driven Advisers LLC raised its position in shares of JPMorgan US Quality Factor ETF by 63.2% in the 2nd quarter. 
Intelligence Driven Advisers LLC now owns 228,891 shares of the company's stock valued at $8,622,000 after 
buying an additional 88,607 shares in the last quarter. Finally, Truist Financial Corp acquired a new position in 
shares of JPMorgan US Quality Factor ETF in the 2nd quarter valued at approximately $2,813,000. JPMorgan US 
Quality Factor ETF Stock Performance Shares of NYSEARCA:JQUA[3] opened at $38.40 on Friday. The firm has a 
50 day moving average of $37.33 and a 200-day moving average of $38.61. JPMorgan US Quality Factor ETF has 
a 12 month low of $34.47 and a 12 month high of $45.77.

Megaport (OTCMKTS:MGPPF[1] - Get Rating[2]) in a research note released on Thursday morning, The Fly[3] 
reports. The brokerage issued an overweight rating on the stock. 
Separately, Canaccord Genuity Group raised Megaport from a hold rating to a buy rating in a research note on 
Thursday, July 21st. Megaport Price Performance Megaport stock[4] opened at $5.88 on Thursday. Megaport has a 
fifty-two week low of $3.66 and a fifty-two week high of $15.39. The firm's fifty day moving average price is $5.88 
and its 200-day moving average price is $6.45. About Megaport (Get Rating[2]) Megaport Limited provides elastic 
interconnection services to the enterprises and service providers in Australia, New Zealand, Hong Kong, Singapore, 
Japan, North America, and Europe. It operates a platform that enables customers to connect their network to other 
services, as well as creates agile network that connects in multiple regions. Featured StoriesGet a free copy of the

Short Interest in Torex Gold Resources Inc. (OTCMKTS:TORXF) Drops By 
12.6%

Zolmax.com

Body
Oct 30, 2022( Zolmax.com: http://www.zolmax.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 Torex Gold Resources Inc. (OTCMKTS:TORXF[1] - Get Rating[2]) was the recipient of a significant drop in short 
interest during the month of October. 
As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 1,293,700 shares, a drop of 12.6% from the September 30th 
total of 1,479,800 shares. Based on an average trading volume of 55,200 shares, the days-to-cover ratio is 
presently 23.4 days. Torex Gold Resources Stock Down 1.3 % OTCMKTS TORXF[3] opened at $7.37 on Friday. 
Torex Gold Resources has a 1-year low of $5.75 and a 1-year high of $13.65. The firm's fifty day simple moving 
average is $7.21 and its 200-day simple moving average is $8.52. Analyst Ratings Changes A number of research 
analysts recently weighed in on the company. National Bank Financial reduced their target price on Torex Gold 
Resources from C$15.50 to C$15.00 in a report on Thursday, October 13th. Scotiabank reduced their price 
objective on Torex Gold Resources from C$23.00 to C$18.00 in a research note on Monday, October 24th. Finally, 
Stifel Nicolaus dropped their target price on Torex Gold Resources from C$25.00 to C$21.50 in a research report 
on Wednesday, July 20th. Torex Gold Resources Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) Torex Gold Resources Inc 
operates as an intermediate gold producer in Mexico. It primarily holds a 100% interest in the Morelos Gold 
property that covers an area of 29,000 hectares located southwest of Mexico City. The company's principal assets 
include the El Limn Guajes mining complex comprising the El Limn Guajes open pits, the El Limn Guajes 
underground mine, and the processing plant and related infrastructure, and the Media Luna deposit, which is an 
advanced stage development project. See AlsoGet a free copy of the StockNews.com research report on Torex

 Shares of Regulus Resources Inc. (CVE:REG[1] - Get Rating[2]) traded down 4.7% during trading on Friday . The 
company traded as low as C$0.81 and last traded at C$0.81. 44,500 shares were traded during trading, a decline of 
2% from the average session volume of 45,612 shares. 
The stock had previously closed at C$0.85. Regulus Resources Stock Down 4.7 % The company has a market 
capitalization of C$82.50 million and a PE ratio of -23.82. The company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.51, a quick 
ratio of 0.67 and a current ratio of 0.88. The stock's 50 day moving average is C$0.83 and its 200 day moving 
average is C$0.89. About Regulus Resources (Get Rating[2]) Regulus Resources Inc operates as a mineral 
exploration company. Its flagship project is the AntaKori copper-gold-silver project comprises 20 mineral 
concessions that cover an area of 438 hectares located in the Yanacocha-Hualgayoc mining district in the 
Department of Cajamarca, Northern Peru. Regulus Resources Inc was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in

Oct 30, 2022( Ticker Report: http://www.tickerreport.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 IFG Advisory LLC lifted its stake in Aberdeen Standard Physical Silver Shares ETF (NYSEARCA:SIVR[1] - Get 
Rating[2]) by 4.5% during the second quarter, according to its most recent disclosure with the Securities and 
Exchange Commission. The fund owned 24,845 shares of the company's stock after acquiring an additional 1,075 
shares during the quarter. IFG Advisory LLC owned approximately 0.05% of Aberdeen Standard Physical Silver 
Shares ETF worth $483,000 as of its most recent filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission.  
A number of other hedge funds have also modified their holdings of SIVR. Clearstead Advisors LLC increased its 
position in Aberdeen Standard Physical Silver Shares ETF by 25.8% during the first quarter. Clearstead Advisors 
LLC now owns 7,358 shares of the company's stock worth $175,000 after buying an additional 1,510 shares during 
the last quarter. Claraphi Advisory Network LLC acquired a new position in Aberdeen Standard Physical Silver 
Shares ETF during the first quarter worth $203,000. Phillips Financial Management LLC acquired a new position in 
Aberdeen Standard Physical Silver Shares ETF during the first quarter worth $206,000. First Heartland Consultants 
Inc. acquired a new position in Aberdeen Standard Physical Silver Shares ETF during the first quarter worth 
$209,000. Finally, Private Advisor Group LLC acquired a new position in Aberdeen Standard Physical Silver Shares 
ETF during the first quarter worth $213,000. Aberdeen Standard Physical Silver Shares ETF Price Performance 
Aberdeen Standard Physical Silver Shares ETF stock[3] opened at $18.51 on Friday. Aberdeen Standard Physical 
Silver Shares ETF has a one year low of $16.89 and a one year high of $25.95. The company's fifty day moving 
average price is $18.35 and its two-hundred day moving average price is $19.71. About Aberdeen Standard 
Physical Silver Shares ETF (Get Rating[2]) ETFS Silver Trust (the Trust) is formed to own silver transferred to the 
Trust in exchange for shares issued by the Trust. The investment objective of the Trust is for the Shares to reflect 
the performance of the price of silver bullion, less the expenses of the Trust's operations. ETFS Physical Silver 
Shares (the Shares) are issued by ETFS Silver Trust. Read MoreGet a free copy of the StockNews.com research

firm has a market capitalization of 2.41 million and a P/E ratio of 2.40. PV Crystalox Solar plc (PVCS.L) Company 
Profile (Get Rating[2]) PV Crystalox Solar PLC produces and supplies multicrystalline silicon ingots and wafers for 
use in solar electricity generation systems. It serves solar cell producers in Japan, Taiwan, Canada, Germany, the 
United Kingdom, rest of Europe, and internationally. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in

ASM International (OTCMKTS: ASMIY ) PT Lowered to  300.00
ASM International (OTCMKTS:ASMIY) PT Lowered to  300.00
American Banking and Market News
October 29, 2022 Saturday
Copyright 2022 American Banking and Market News All Rights Reserved
Length: 470 words
Body
ASM International ASM International (OTCMKTS:ASMIY  - Get Rating ) had its target price cut by analysts at 
Deutsche Bank Aktiengesellschaft  from  325.00 ($331.63) to  300.00 ($306.12) in a note issued to investors on 
Friday, The Fly  reports. 
Several other analysts also recently commented on the stock. The Goldman Sachs Group assumed coverage on 
shares of ASM International in a research report on Tuesday, October 4th. They set a "buy" rating on the stock. 
UBS Group dropped their price target on shares of ASM International from  400.00 ($408.16) to  370.00 ($377.55) 
and set a "buy" rating on the stock in a report on Thursday, July 21st. Finally, Berenberg Bank lowered their price 
objective on shares of ASM International from  340.00 ($346.94) to  320.00 ($326.53) and set a "buy" rating on the 
stock in a research note on Friday, October 14th. Two analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and eight 
have issued  a buy rating to the stock. Based on data from MarketBeat.com, the stock currently has an average 
rating of "Moderate Buy" and a consensus target price of $358.80.ASM International Price Performance
ASMIY stock  traded down $21.27 during trading on Friday, hitting $232.45. 6,933 shares of the stock traded hands, 
compared to its average volume of 7,225. ASM International has a 1 year low of $201.38 and a 1 year high of 
$497.06. The firm's 50 day moving average is $256.73 and its two-hundred day moving average is $275.78. The 
stock has a market cap of $11.32 billion, a price-to-earnings ratio of 36.66 and a beta of 1.68. About ASM 
International (Get Rating ) 
ASM International NV, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, 
marketing, and servicing of equipment and materials that are used to produce semiconductor devices in the United 
States, Europe, and Asia. Its products include wafer processing deposition systems for single-wafer atomic layer 
deposition, plasma enhanced chemical vapor deposition, epitaxy, and batch diffusion/furnace systems, as well as 
provides spare parts and support services.Featured Stories

Research

October 29, 2022 Saturday

Length: 437 words
Body
Danske Bank A/S Danske Bank A/S (OTCMKTS:DNKEY  - Get Rating ) was upgraded by Nordea Equity 
Research from a "hold" rating to a "buy" rating in a note issued to investors on Friday, The Fly  reports. The firm 
presently has a 135.00 price target on the financial services provider's stock. 
A number of other equities analysts have also commented on DNKEY. Deutsche Bank Aktiengesellschaft lifted their 
price objective on Danske Bank A/S from 112.00 to 113.00 in a research note on Tuesday, October 11th. Barclays 
cut their price objective on Danske Bank A/S from 93.00 to 92.00 in a research note on Tuesday, October 4th. 
Three analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating, two have given a hold rating and two have issued  a buy 
rating to the stock. According to MarketBeat, the company presently has a consensus rating of "Hold" and an 
average target price of $117.86.Danske Bank A/S Price Performance
Shares of OTCMKTS DNKEY  traded up $0.76 during mid-day trading on Friday, reaching $7.64. The company had 
a trading volume of 23,277 shares, compared to its average volume of 98,510. Danske Bank A/S has a one year 
low of $5.96 and a one year high of $10.30. The company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 7.08, a quick ratio of 1.58 
and a current ratio of 1.58. The business's 50-day simple moving average is $6.58 and its 200 day simple moving

Reckitt Benckiser Group Reckitt Benckiser Group (OTCMKTS:RBGLY  - Get Rating ) had its price objective cut 
by analysts at Berenberg Bank  from GBX 8,200 ($99.08) to GBX 7,050 ($85.19) in a research report issued to 
clients and investors on Friday, The Fly  reports. 
Several other equities analysts have also recently issued reports on the company. Sanford C. Bernstein raised 
Reckitt Benckiser Group from an "underperform" rating to a "market perform" rating in a report on Thursday, July 
28th. Barclays decreased their price objective on Reckitt Benckiser Group from GBX 8,900 ($107.54) to GBX 8,200 
($99.08) in a report on Thursday. Finally, UBS Group boosted their price objective on Reckitt Benckiser Group from 
GBX 8,400 ($101.50) to GBX 8,700 ($105.12) in a report on Thursday, July 28th. Two research analysts have rated 
the stock with a sell rating, two have assigned  a hold rating and one  has issued  a buy rating to the company's 
stock. Based on data from MarketBeat, Reckitt Benckiser Group presently has a consensus rating of "Hold" and a 
consensus target price of $7,612.50.Reckitt Benckiser Group Stock Down 2.7 %
RBGLY stock  traded down $0.36 on Friday, hitting $12.88. 1,243,282 shares of the company's stock were 
exchanged, compared to its average volume of 1,223,522. Reckitt Benckiser Group has a 12-month low of $12.71 
and a 12-month high of $17.90. The firm has a 50 day moving average price of $14.19 and a two-hundred day 
moving average price of $15.17. The company has a quick ratio of 0.47, a current ratio of 0.70 and a debt-to-equity 
ratio of 0.84. Reckitt Benckiser Group Company Profile (Get Rating ) 
Reckitt Benckiser Group plc manufactures and sells health, hygiene, and nutrition products in the United Kingdom, 
the United States, China, India, and internationally. The company offers acne treatment creams, facial washes, and 
cleansing pads; disinfection, hygiene, and first aid products; condoms, sex toys, and lubricants; heartburn and 
indigestion solutions; and cough and chest congestion, multi-symptom, and sinus remedies for adults and children 
under the Clearasil, Dettol, Durex, Gaviscon, and Mucinex brands.Featured Articles

Advaxis Advaxis, Inc. (OTCMKTS:ADXS  - Get Rating ) was the target of a significant decrease in short interest in 
the month of October. As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 2,700 shares,  a decrease of 20.6% 
from the September 30th total of 3,400 shares. Based on an average daily volume of 4,200 shares, the days-to-
cover ratio is presently 0.6 days.  Advaxis Stock Performance
Shares of OTCMKTS:ADXS  opened at $2.03 on Friday. The stock has a market capitalization of $3.69 million, a 
price-to-earnings ratio of -20.30 and a beta of 2.07. Advaxis has a 1-year low of $1.02 and a 1-year high of $43.20. 
The company's fifty day moving average is $2.14 and its two-hundred day moving average is $3.06.  
Advaxis (OTCMKTS:ADXS  - Get Rating ) last issued its earnings results on Monday, September 12th. The 
biotechnology company reported ($3.83) earnings per share for the quarter.  Analyst Ratings Changes
Separately, StockNews.com  began coverage on shares of Advaxis in a research note on Tuesday, October 11th. 
They issued a "sell" rating for the company. About Advaxis (Get Rating )
Advaxis, Inc, a clinical-stage biotechnology company, focuses on the discovery, development, and 
commercialization of proprietary Listeria monocytogenes (Lm) technology antigen delivery products in the United 
States. The company is developing ADXS-PSA, which is in Phase 2 clinical trials for the treatment of metastatic 
prostate cancer; ADXS-503 that is in Phase 1/2 clinical trials for the treatment of non-small cell lung cancer; and 
ADXS-504 for the treatment of prostate cancer.Further Reading

on Friday, October 7th will be given a dividend of $0.0668 per share. The ex-dividend date is Thursday, October

of 1.66%. Wall Street Analyst Weigh In

29th.The Weir Group Company Profile (Get Rating ) 
The Weir Group PLC produces and sells highly engineered original equipment worldwide. It operates in two 
segments, Minerals and ESCO. The Minerals segment offers slurry handling equipment and associated aftermarket 
support services for abrasive high-wear applications used in the mining and oil sands markets.Recommended

WANdisco Company Profile (Get Rating )
WANdisco plc engages in the development and provision of collaboration software in North America, Europe, and 
internationally. The company's WANdisco Data Activation Platform offers Data Migrator, an automated cloud 
migration solution that migrates HDFS data and Hive metadata to the cloud; Data Migrator for Azure, a native Azure 
service that enables users to migrate petabyte-scale Hadoop data and Hive metadata to the Azure cloud; and Edge 
to Cloud, a tool designed to move IoT and file data across edge systems, data centers, and public clouds to enable 
organizations to activate their data for AI, machine learning, and advanced analytics on modern cloud data

high of $14.63. About Gatos Silver (Get Rating )

for silver ores. The company also explores for zinc, lead, copper, and gold ores. Its flagship asset is the Cerro Los 
Gatos mine located at the Los Gatos District in Chihuahua state, Mexico.Read More

alerts, messaging, monitoring, and wander management solution; and Telligence, a patient response

year is $0.83.

Heineken Heineken (OTCMKTS:HEINY  - Get Rating ) had its price target dropped by equities research analysts 
at Royal Bank of Canada  from  79.00 ($80.61) to  77.00 ($78.57) in a report issued on Friday, The Fly  reports. 
Other equities research analysts also recently issued reports about the stock. Credit Suisse Group cut their price 
target on shares of Heineken from  123.00 ($125.51) to  105.00 ($107.14) in a report on Friday. Deutsche Bank 
Aktiengesellschaft cut their price target on shares of Heineken from  116.00 ($118.37) to  114.00 ($116.33) and set 
a "buy" rating for the company in a report on Thursday. Finally, Societe Generale cut their price target on shares of 
Heineken from  125.00 ($127.55) to  120.00 ($122.45) and set a "buy" rating for the company in a report on 
Wednesday, October 5th. Two equities research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating, two have issued  a 
hold rating and four have assigned  a buy rating to the company's stock. Based on data from MarketBeat.com, 
Heineken presently has an average rating of "Hold" and an average price target of $101.80.Heineken Stock 
Performance
HEINY stock  traded down $0.60 during trading on Friday, hitting $41.32. The company had a trading volume of 
84,504 shares, compared to its average volume of 70,951. Heineken has a fifty-two week low of $40.86 and a fifty-
two week high of $59.35. The business has a 50 day moving average of $44.51 and a 200 day moving average of 
$46.90. Heineken Company Profile (Get Rating ) 
Heineken N.V. engages in the brewing and selling of beer and cider. It also provides soft drinks and water. It offers 
its beers under the Heineken, Amstel, Desperados, Sol, Tiger, Birra Moretti, Affligem, Lagunitas, and Mort Subite 
brands, as well as under various other regional and local brands; and cider under the Strongbow Apple Ciders, 
Orchard Thieves, Follow The Fox, Cidrerie Stassen, Bulmers, Old Mout, and Blind Pig brands.Further Reading

Frontier Developments Frontier Developments plc (LON:FDEV  - Get Rating ) has received an average 
recommendation of "Moderate Buy" from the seven ratings firms that are presently  covering the company, 
MarketBeat  reports. One research analyst  has rated the stock with a hold recommendation and six have issued  a 
buy recommendation on  the company. The average 1-year price target among brokerages that have issued ratings 
on the stock in the last year is GBX 2,654.20 ($32.07).  
A number of brokerages have issued reports on FDEV. Shore Capital  reiterated a "hold" rating on shares of 
Frontier Developments in a research note on Wednesday, September 21st. Berenberg Bank  reiterated a "buy" 
rating and set a GBX 2,000 ($24.17) price objective on shares of Frontier Developments in a research note on 
Friday, September 23rd. Finally, Credit Suisse Group reduced their price target on shares of Frontier Developments 
from GBX 1,855 ($22.41) to GBX 1,800 ($21.75) and set an "outperform" rating on the stock in a research note on 
Monday, September 26th. Frontier Developments Trading Up 3.4 %
Shares of Frontier Developments stock  opened at GBX 1,334 ($16.12) on Wednesday. The company has a market 
capitalization of £525.90 million and a price-to-earnings ratio of 5,558.33. The company has a quick ratio of 2.61, a 
current ratio of 2.77 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 17.52. Frontier Developments has a 12-month low of GBX 1,066 
($12.88) and a 12-month high of GBX 2,615 ($31.60). The firm's 50-day moving average price is GBX 1,325.49 and 
its two-hundred day moving average price is GBX 1,358.90.  Frontier Developments Company Profile (Get Rating )
Frontier Developments plc develops and publishes video games for personal computers and videogame consoles 
in the United Kingdom. The company develops games across various platforms using its cross-platform technology, 
Cobra. It also publishes games developed by selected partner studios under its Frontier Foundry games 
label.Featured Articles

Rating[2]) COVA Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. It focuses on effecting a merger, share

short interest in October. As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 10,600 shares, an increase of 68.3% 
from the September 30th total of 6,300 shares. 
Based on an average trading volume of 156,800 shares, the days-to-cover ratio is currently 0.1 days.

trading on Friday, reaching $66.86. 31,073 shares of the stock were exchanged, compared to its average volume of 
55,209. The business's 50 day moving average is $63.66 and its 200-day moving average is $67.81. 
Commonwealth Bank of Australia has a 1 year low of $58.14 and a 1 year high of $82.19. Commonwealth Bank of 
Australia Increases Dividend The business also recently disclosed a dividend, which was paid on Monday, October 
10th. Shareholders of record on Monday, August 22nd were issued a dividend of $1.4456 per share. This 
represents a yield of 3.83%. This is an increase from Commonwealth Bank of Australia's previous dividend of 
$1.24. The ex-dividend date of this dividend was Friday, August 19th. Analysts Set New Price Targets Separately, 
Jefferies Financial Group lowered shares of Commonwealth Bank of Australia from a "buy" rating to a "hold" rating 
in a research note on Thursday, August 11th. Commonwealth Bank of Australia Company Profile (Get Rating[2])

internationally. It operates through Retail Banking Services, Business Banking, Institutional Banking and Markets, 
and New Zealand segments. The company offers transaction, savings, and foreign currency accounts; term

trade; and private banking services, as well as home and car loans. Read MoreGet a free copy of the

average of $0.38 and a 200-day simple moving average of $0.48. EnWave Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) 
EnWave Corporation designs, constructs, markets, licenses, installs, and sells vacuum-microwave machinery for 
the food, cannabis, and biomaterial dehydration industries in Canada and the United States. It offers radiant energy 
vacuum (REV) dehydration platforms, such as nutraREV and quantaREV to dehydrate fruits, vegetables, herbs, 
dairy products, ready-to-eat meals, instant baked goods, cannabis products, nutraceuticals, pharmaceuticals, and

Oct 29, 2022( DailyPolitical: http://www.dailypolitical.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 Bellicum Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ:BLCM[1] - Get Rating[2]) saw a large increase in short interest in the 
month of October. As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 132,900 shares, an increase of 25.6% from 
the September 30th total of 105,800 shares. Approximately 1.6% of the shares of the company are short sold. 
Based on an average daily trading volume, of 19,100 shares, the short-interest ratio is currently 7.0 days. Bellicum 
Pharmaceuticals Stock Performance Shares of NASDAQ:BLCM[3] traded up $0.02 during trading on Friday, hitting 
$1.05. 17,133 shares of the stock were exchanged, compared to its average volume of 16,590. Bellicum 
Pharmaceuticals has a 1-year low of $0.93 and a 1-year high of $2.20. The company has a market capitalization of 
$9.04 million, a price-to-earnings ratio of -5.25 and a beta of 1.31. The company's fifty day simple moving average 
is $1.18 and its 200-day simple moving average is $1.32.  
Bellicum Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ:BLCM[1] - Get Rating[2]) last announced its quarterly earnings results on 
Thursday, August 11th. The biopharmaceutical company reported ($0.13) EPS for the quarter. On average, 
research analysts forecast that Bellicum Pharmaceuticals will post -1.68 earnings per share for the current fiscal 
year. Wall Street Analysts Forecast Growth Separately, StockNews.com[2] assumed coverage on Bellicum 
Pharmaceuticals in a report on Friday. They set a "sell" rating on the stock. About Bellicum Pharmaceuticals (Get 
Rating[2]) Bellicum Pharmaceuticals, Inc, a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company, focuses on discovering and 
developing novel cellular immunotherapies for the treatment of hematological cancers and solid tumors in the 
United States and internationally. The company's clinical product candidates include BPX-601, an autologous 
GoCAR-T product candidate, which is in Phase 1/2 clinical trials for the treatment of solid tumors expressing the 
prostate stem cell antigen; and BPX-603, a dual-switch GoCAR-T product candidate that is in Phase 1/2 clinical 
trials to treat solid tumors that express the human epidermal growth factor receptor 2 antigens. Featured ArticlesGet

 New York Mortgage Trust, Inc. (NASDAQ:NYMTM[1] - Get Rating[2]) was the recipient of a significant increase in 
short interest in October. As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 7,600 shares, an increase of 533.3% 
from the September 30th total of 1,200 shares. 
Based on an average daily volume of 27,400 shares, the days-to-cover ratio is presently 0.3 days. New York 
Mortgage Trust Stock Performance Shares of NYMTM stock[3] traded up $0.18 on Friday, reaching $18.18. The 
company's stock had a trading volume of 17,143 shares, compared to its average volume of 22,871. The stock's 
fifty day simple moving average is $19.63. New York Mortgage Trust has a 1 year low of $16.51 and a 1 year high 
of $25.94. New York Mortgage Trust Announces Dividend The firm also recently announced a quarterly dividend, 
which was paid on Saturday, October 15th. Investors of record on Saturday, October 1st were issued a $0.4922 
dividend. This represents a $1.97 dividend on an annualized basis and a dividend yield of 10.83%. The ex-dividend 
date of this dividend was Thursday, September 29th. About New York Mortgage Trust (Get Rating[2]) New York 
Mortgage Trust, Inc acquires, invests in, finances, and manages mortgage-related single-family and multi-family 
residential assets in the United States. Its targeted investments include residential loans, second mortgages, and 
business purpose loans; structured multi-family property investments, such as preferred equity in, and mezzanine 
loans to owners of multi-family properties, as well as joint venture equity investments in multi-family properties; non-
agency residential mortgage-backed securities (RMBS); agency RMBS; commercial mortgage-backed securities 
(CMBS); and other mortgage, residential housing, and credit-related assets. Recommended StoriesGet a free copy

Banks, Asset Management, Private Banking, and Insurance. The company offers lending and deposit products;

Oct 28, 2022( DailyPolitical: http://www.dailypolitical.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 https://www.marketbeat.com/logos/generic-stocks11.jpgThe Scottish Oriental Smaller Companies Trust plc 
(LON:SST[1] - Get Rating[2]) announced a dividend on Friday, October 28th, Upcoming.Co.Uk[3] reports. 
Shareholders of record on Thursday, December 1st will be paid a dividend of GBX 14 ($0.17) per share on Friday, 
January 13th. This represents a dividend yield of 1.27%. The ex-dividend date of this dividend is Thursday, 
December 1st. This is an increase from The Scottish Oriental Smaller Companies Trust's previous dividend of 
$11.50. The official announcement can be viewed at this link[4]. The Scottish Oriental Smaller Companies Trust 
Stock Up 0.5 % SST[5] traded up GBX 5 ($0.06) during trading on Friday, reaching GBX 1,102.50 ($13.32). The 
company had a trading volume of 1,919 shares, compared to its average volume of 26,045. The company has a 
market cap of 272.79 million and a P/E ratio of 1,347.23. The Scottish Oriental Smaller Companies Trust has a 12 
month low of GBX 998.82 ($12.07) and a 12 month high of GBX 1,258.64 ($15.21). The company has a debt-to-
equity ratio of 9.43, a current ratio of 7.84 and a quick ratio of 7.84. The business's fifty day moving average price is 
GBX 1,155.05 and its 200 day moving average price is GBX 1,117.54. Insider Transactions at The Scottish Oriental 
Smaller Companies Trust In related news, insider Jeremy Whitley purchased 3,000 shares of the firm's stock in a 
transaction on Wednesday, August 24th. The stock was purchased at an average cost of GBX 1,111 ($13.42) per 
share, for a total transaction of 33,330 ($40,273.08). The Scottish Oriental Smaller Companies Trust Company 
Profile (Get Rating[2]) The Scottish Oriental Smaller Companies Trust plc is a closed-ended equity mutual fund 
launched and managed by First Sentier Investors (UK) Funds Limited. It is co-managed by First State Investment 
Management (UK) Limited. The fund invests in the public equity markets of Asia, excluding Japan and Australasia.

interest during the month of October. As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 3,100 shares, a drop of 
90.4% from the September 30th total of 32,300 shares.

a report on Friday, August 5th. Deutsche Bank Aktiengesellschaft set a €78.00 ($79.59) price objective on Aurubis 
in a research report on Tuesday. Aurubis Price Performance Shares of ETR:NDA[4] opened at €63.66 ($64.96) on 
Tuesday. Aurubis has a 1-year low of €51.00 ($52.04) and a 1-year high of €116.85 ($119.23). The company has a 
debt-to-equity ratio of 7.57, a current ratio of 2.34 and a quick ratio of 0.71. The business has a fifty day moving 
average price of €59.12 and a 200-day moving average price of €74.06. The company has a market capitalization 
of $2.78 billion and a PE ratio of 3.80. Aurubis Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) Aurubis AG processes metal 
concentrates and recycling materials in Germany. The company processes scrap metals, organic and inorganic 
metalbearing recycling raw materials, and industrial residues. It also offers wire rods and specialty wires, shapes,

 Cineplex Inc. (OTCMKTS:CPXGF[1] - Get Rating[2]) saw a significant increase in short interest during the month of 
October. As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 245,000 shares, an increase of 20.5% from the 
September 30th total of 203,300 shares. 
Based on an average daily trading volume, of 1,900 shares, the days-to-cover ratio is currently 128.9 days. Wall 
Street Analysts Forecast Growth A number of analysts recently issued reports on CPXGF shares. TD Securities 
lowered their price target on Cineplex from C$18.50 to C$17.50 in a research report on Monday, August 22nd. 
National Bank Financial decreased their target price on Cineplex from C$19.00 to C$15.50 in a research report on 
Tuesday, July 19th. Royal Bank of Canada upgraded Cineplex from a "sector perform" rating to an "outperform" 
rating in a research report on Monday, September 12th. Finally, Scotiabank decreased their target price on 
Cineplex from C$16.00 to C$14.75 in a research report on Friday, August 19th. Cineplex Stock Performance 
Shares of CPXGF stock[3] traded up $0.53 on Friday, hitting $6.66. The stock had a trading volume of 1,300 
shares, compared to its average volume of 4,407. The business has a 50 day moving average price of $6.69 and a 
200 day moving average price of $8.31. Cineplex has a one year low of $6.00 and a one year high of $12.47.

 Shares of ZK International Group Co., Ltd. (NASDAQ:ZKIN[1] - Get Rating[2]) were up 0.8% on Friday . The 
company traded as high as $0.67 and last traded at $0.66. Approximately 12,074 shares were traded during 
trading, a decline of 95% from the average daily volume of 220,900 shares. 
The stock had previously closed at $0.66. ZK International Group Stock Performance The stock has a 50 day 
simple moving average of $0.84 and a 200-day simple moving average of $1.03. Hedge Funds Weigh In On ZK 
International Group A hedge fund recently raised its stake in ZK International Group stock. Millennium Management 
LLC grew its position in ZK International Group Co., Ltd. (NASDAQ:ZKIN[1] - Get Rating[2]) by 207.1% in the 2nd 
quarter, according to its most recent disclosure with the SEC. The fund owned 61,877 shares of the company's 
stock after buying an additional 41,728 shares during the period. Millennium Management LLC owned 
approximately 0.21% of ZK International Group worth $64,000 as of its most recent SEC filing. Hedge funds and 
other institutional investors own 0.91% of the company's stock. ZK International Group Company Profile (Get 
Rating[2]) ZK International Group Co, Ltd., through its subsidiaries, engages in the designing, producing, and 
selling double-press thin-walled stainless steel, carbon steel, and single-press tubes and fittings in the People's 
Republic of China. It offers carbon and stainless steel strips; carbon and stainless steel pipes; light gauge stainless 
steel pipes; pipe connections and fittings; and couplings, unions, adapters, caps, plug pipes, elbows, three-way 
fittings, tees, cross, side-inlet elbows, wyes, reducers, bushings, pipe fasteners, and pipe flanges. Featured

October.

trading volume, of 26,700 shares, the days-to-cover ratio is currently 0.1 days. Wall Street Analyst Weigh In

moving average of GBX 547.89. The company has a market capitalization of 714.32 million and a P/E ratio of

Thursday, November 10th. Investors of record on Thursday, October 6th will be issued a GBX 6.85 ($0.08) 
dividend. The ex-dividend date is Thursday, October 6th. This represents a yield of 1.41%. The Merchants Trust's 
dividend payout ratio is currently 43.41%. The Merchants Trust Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) The Merchants 
Trust Plc is a closed-ended equity mutual fund launched and managed by Allianz Global Investors GmbH, UK

objective on Puma (ETR:PUM[1] - Get Rating[2]) in a research report report published on Wednesday morning, 
Borsen Zeitung[3] reports.

target on shares of Puma in a report on Monday, October 10th. Baader Bank set a €72.00 ($73.47) price objective 
on shares of Puma in a research note on Wednesday, July 27th. Berenberg Bank set a €82.00 ($83.67) price

57.39, a current ratio of 1.57 and a quick ratio of 0.63. The company has a market capitalization of $6.85 billion and 
a P/E ratio of 19.31. Puma Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) PUMA SE, together with its subsidiaries, designs, 
develops, sells, and markets footwear, apparel, and accessories for men, women, and kids in Europe, the Middle 
East, Africa, the Americas, Greater China, and the Asia Pacific. The company offers performance and sport-

Body
Oct 29, 2022( DailyPolitical: http://www.dailypolitical.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 Tenon Medical, Inc. (NASDAQ:TNON[1] - Get Rating[2]) was the recipient of a large increase in short interest 
during the month of October. As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 108,400 shares, an increase of 
51.2% from the September 30th total of 71,700 shares. 
Currently, 1.5% of the company's stock are sold short. Based on an average daily volume of 195,000 shares, the 
short-interest ratio is presently 0.6 days. Hedge Funds Weigh In On Tenon Medical A hedge fund recently bought a 
new stake in Tenon Medical stock. TMD Wealth Management LLC purchased a new position in shares of Tenon 
Medical, Inc. (NASDAQ:TNON[1] - Get Rating[2]) during the 2nd quarter, according to its most recent disclosure 
with the Securities and Exchange Commission. The firm purchased 514,969 shares of the company's stock, valued 
at approximately $1,164,000. Tenon Medical accounts for about 0.5% of TMD Wealth Management LLC's 
investment portfolio, making the stock its 17th largest holding. TMD Wealth Management LLC owned approximately 
4.58% of Tenon Medical at the end of the most recent quarter. Tenon Medical Trading Up 1.1 % Shares of TNON[3] 
traded up $0.02 during midday trading on Friday, hitting $1.84. 9,136 shares of the company's stock traded hands, 
compared to its average volume of 29,755. Tenon Medical has a 1 year low of $1.14 and a 1 year high of $59.89. 
The company's fifty day moving average is $1.73.  
Tenon Medical (NASDAQ:TNON[1] - Get Rating[2]) last released its earnings results on Thursday, August 11th. 
The company reported ($0.65) earnings per share (EPS) for the quarter. The company had revenue of $0.14 million 
during the quarter. About Tenon Medical (Get Rating[2]) Tenon Medical, Inc, a medical device company, develops 
surgical implant systems to optimize sacroiliac joint fixation/fusion surgery and corresponding outcomes. It sells The 
CATAMARAN SIJ Fusion System that includes instruments and implants designed to prepare and fixate the SI-
Joint for fusion in the United States and Puerto Rico. Read MoreGet a free copy of the StockNews.com research

Oct 28, 2022( DailyPolitical: http://www.dailypolitical.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 St. James's Place plc (OTCMKTS:STJPF[1] - Get Rating[2]) was the recipient of a significant decline in short 
interest in the month of October. 
As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 74,500 shares, a decline of 19.5% from the September 30th 
total of 92,600 shares. Based on an average trading volume of 3,800 shares, the short-interest ratio is presently 
19.6 days. St. James's Place Stock Performance Shares of STJPF[3] remained flat at $10.79 during midday trading 
on Friday. The firm's fifty day simple moving average is $12.40 and its 200 day simple moving average is $13.98. 
St. James's Place has a 1 year low of $9.60 and a 1 year high of $23.50. Wall Street Analysts Forecast Growth A 
number of research firms have issued reports on STJPF. Barclays lowered their price target on St. James's Place 
from GBX 1,800 ($21.75) to GBX 1,673 ($20.22) in a research report on Monday, October 17th. JPMorgan Chase & 
Co. lowered their price target on St. James's Place from GBX 1,040 ($12.57) to GBX 1,020 ($12.32) in a research 
report on Thursday. Two equities research analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and five have issued a 
buy rating to the company. Based on data from MarketBeat.com, the company presently has an average rating of 
"Moderate Buy" and an average price target of $1,518.29. St. James's Place Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) St. 
James's Place plc is a publicly owned investment manager. The firm launches and manages equity, fixed income, 
and balanced mutual funds for its clients. It invests in public equity and fixed income market across the globe. The 
firm was formerly known as St. James's Place Capital plc. St. Further ReadingGet a free copy of the

29th, investing.com[3] reports.

November 25th. This represents a yield of 3.61%. The ex-dividend date is Friday, November 4th. Singapore 
Exchange Stock Performance Shares of OTCMKTS SPXCY[4] opened at $90.15 on Friday. The company's 50 day 
moving average price is $97.81 and its 200-day moving average price is $102.93. Singapore Exchange has a 52-
week low of $85.30 and a 52-week high of $111.50. Wall Street Analysts Forecast Growth Separately, JPMorgan 
Chase & Co. lowered Singapore Exchange from an "overweight" rating to an "underweight" rating in a research 
report on Thursday, October 13th. About Singapore Exchange (Get Rating[2]) Singapore Exchange Limited, 
together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated securities and derivatives exchange, and related clearing 
houses in Singapore. It operates through Fixed Income, Currencies, and Commodities; Equities; and Data,

 Ei Group plc (EIG.L) (LON:EIG[1] - Get Rating[2])'s share price dropped 0.1% on Friday . The company traded as 
low as GBX 284.60 ($3.44) and last traded at GBX 284.60 ($3.44). Approximately 27,174 shares traded hands 
during mid-day trading, a decline of 98% from the average daily volume of 1,576,027 shares. 
The stock had previously closed at GBX 284.80 ($3.44). Ei Group plc (EIG.L) Stock Performance The business's 
50-day simple moving average is GBX 284.60 and its two-hundred day simple moving average is GBX 284.60. The 
firm has a market cap of 1.26 billion and a price-to-earnings ratio of -6.16. The company has a quick ratio of 0.86, a 
current ratio of 1.01 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 143.83. About Ei Group plc (EIG.L) (Get Rating[2]) Ei Group plc 
operates leased and tenanted pubs in the United Kingdom. It operates through three segments: Publican 
Partnerships, Commercial Properties, and Managed. The company engages in the rental of commercial properties, 
as well as financing and public houses management businesses. It is also involved in the sale of foods and drinks, 
as well as accommodation and gaming machines. Featured ArticlesMcDonalds Stock Sizzles, but Will it Hit a New

 Shares of Capital & Regional Plc (LON:CAL[1] - Get Rating[2]) crossed below its two hundred day moving average 
during trading on Thursday . The stock has a two hundred day moving average of GBX 57.81 ($0.70) and traded as 
low as GBX 47.25 ($0.57). Capital & Regional shares last traded at GBX 47.25 ($0.57), with a volume of 27,071 
shares traded. Analyst Upgrades and Downgrades Separately, Berenberg Bank reiterated a "hold" rating and set a 
GBX 70 ($0.85) price objective on shares of Capital & Regional in a research report on Wednesday, August 31st. 
Capital & Regional Stock Performance The stock's 50-day moving average is GBX 54.65 and its 200-day moving 
average is GBX 57.71. The firm has a market capitalization of 76.08 million and a price-to-earnings ratio of 242.11. 
The company has a current ratio of 2.93, a quick ratio of 1.58 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 134.10. Capital & 
Regional Cuts Dividend The firm also recently declared a dividend, which was paid on Friday, October 7th. 
Shareholders of record on Thursday, September 15th were given a GBX 2.50 ($0.03) dividend. This represents a 
yield of 4.22%. The ex-dividend date was Thursday, September 15th. About Capital & Regional (Get Rating[2]) 
Capital & Regional is a UK focused retail property REIT specialising in shopping centres that dominate their 
catchment, serving the non-discretionary and value orientated needs of the local communities. It has a strong track 
record of delivering value enhancing retail and leisure asset management opportunities across a portfolio of in-town 
shopping centres. See AlsoWill Demand from EV Makers Drive Up Freeport-McMoRan stock?[3]Shopify Stock

 Knorr-Bremse Aktiengesellschaft (ETR:KBX[1] - Get Rating[2]) shares dropped 1.1% on Friday . The company 
traded as low as €45.76 ($46.69) and last traded at €46.00 ($46.94). Approximately 334,575 shares were traded 
during mid-day trading, The stock had previously closed at €46.51 ($47.46). Knorr-Bremse Aktiengesellschaft 
Trading Down 1.1 % The business's 50-day moving average is €46.39 and its two-hundred day moving average is 
€56.51. The company has a quick ratio of 0.86, a current ratio of 1.38 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 96.61. The stock 
has a market capitalization of $7.42 billion and a PE ratio of 14.38. Knorr-Bremse Aktiengesellschaft Company 
Profile (Get Rating[2]) Knorr-Bremse Aktiengesellschaft develops, produces, markets, and services braking and 
other systems for rail and commercial vehicles worldwide. 
The company operates in two segments, Rail Vehicle Systems and Commercial Vehicle Systems. It offers braking, 
entrance and HVAC systems; power electrics and control technology; digital solutions for optimization of rail traffic, 
couplers; signal systems; stationary and mobile testing equipment; wiper and wash systems; and sanitary systems 
for mass transit and long distance rail vehicles. Further ReadingMcDonalds Stock Sizzles, but Will it Hit a New All-

 TC Biopharm (Holdings) Plc (NASDAQ:TCBP[1] - Get Rating[2]) was the target of a significant drop in short 
interest in October. As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 78,200 shares, a drop of 64.1% from the 
September 30th total of 217,600 shares. 
Based on an average daily trading volume, of 330,400 shares, the days-to-cover ratio is presently 0.2 days. 
Institutional Inflows and Outflows Several institutional investors and hedge funds have recently made changes to 
their positions in TCBP. Warberg Asset Management LLC acquired a new position in TC Biopharm in the 2nd 
quarter worth $36,000. KCL Capital L.P. purchased a new stake in TC Biopharm during the 2nd quarter worth 
approximately $37,000. Finally, Legal & General Group Plc acquired a new position in shares of TC Biopharm in the 
2nd quarter valued at approximately $76,000. 1.19% of the stock is currently owned by hedge funds and other 
institutional investors. TC Biopharm Stock Performance TC Biopharm stock[3] traded down $0.01 during midday 
trading on Friday, hitting $0.18. 201,610 shares of the company were exchanged, compared to its average volume 
of 943,605. TC Biopharm has a fifty-two week low of $0.17 and a fifty-two week high of $3.50. The company's fifty 
day moving average price is $0.28 and its 200-day moving average price is $0.54. About TC Biopharm (Get 
Rating[2]) TC Biopharm (Holdings) Plc, a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company, focuses on developing 
immunotherapy products based on its allogeneic gamma delta T cell platform. Its product pipeline includes 
OmnImmune, an unmodified cell therapy used in the treatment of acute myeloid leukemia; and ImmuniStim, an 
unmodified cell therapy to treat COVID-19. Featured ArticlesGet a free copy of the StockNews.com research report

bought a new stake in Tiziana Life Sciences stock. JPMorgan Chase & Co. bought a new stake in Tiziana Life 
Sciences Ltd (NASDAQ:TLSA[1] - Get Rating[2]) during the first quarter, according to its most recent disclosure 
with the SEC. The firm bought 86,258 shares of the company's stock, valued at approximately $91,000. JPMorgan 
Chase & Co. owned about 0.09% of Tiziana Life Sciences at the end of the most recent reporting period. Hedge 
funds and other institutional investors own 10.64% of the company's stock. About Tiziana Life Sciences (Get 
Rating[2]) Tiziana Life Sciences Ltd, a biotechnology company, focuses on the discovery and development of 
molecules to treat human diseases in oncology and immunology. The company's lead product candidate in 
immunology is Foralumab (TZLS-401), a human anti-CD3 monoclonal antibody (mAb) for the treatment of Crohn's, 
graft versus host, ulcerative colitis, multiple sclerosis, type-1 diabetes, inflammatory bowel, psoriasis, and 
rheumatoid arthritis diseases. Further ReadingGet a free copy of the StockNews.com research report on Tiziana

Length: 575 words
Body
Oct 29, 2022( DailyPolitical: http://www.dailypolitical.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 Infineon Technologies AG (OTCMKTS:IFNNY[1] - Get Rating[2]) was the target of a large decline in short interest 
during the month of October. As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 4,400 shares, a decline of 56.0% 
from the September 30th total of 10,000 shares. Based on an average daily trading volume, of 605,100 shares, the 
days-to-cover ratio is currently 0.0 days. Infineon Technologies Stock Up 2.0 % Shares of Infineon Technologies 
stock[3] traded up $0.49 during trading on Friday, hitting $25.34. 159,218 shares of the stock traded hands, 
compared to its average volume of 413,714. The stock has a market cap of $33.09 billion, a P/E ratio of 15.45, a 
PEG ratio of 0.55 and a beta of 1.68. The company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.41, a quick ratio of 1.23 and a 
current ratio of 1.79. Infineon Technologies has a twelve month low of $21.43 and a twelve month high of $49.99. 
The company has a fifty day moving average price of $24.20 and a two-hundred day moving average price of 
$26.30.  
Infineon Technologies (OTCMKTS:IFNNY[1] - Get Rating[2]) last posted its earnings results on Wednesday, August 
3rd. The technology company reported $0.52 earnings per share for the quarter, topping the consensus estimate of 
$0.44 by $0.08. Infineon Technologies had a return on equity of 18.41% and a net margin of 14.59%. The firm had 
revenue of $3.85 billion during the quarter, compared to analyst estimates of $3.58 billion. Equities research 
analysts predict that Infineon Technologies will post 1.98 EPS for the current fiscal year. About Infineon 
Technologies (Get Rating[2]) Infineon Technologies AG designs, develops, manufactures, and markets 
semiconductors and related system solutions worldwide. Its Automotive segment offers automotive 
microcontrollers; 3D ToF, magnetic, and pressure sensors; discrete power semiconductors; IGBT modules; 
industrial microcontrollers; power and radar sensor integrated circuits (ICs); transceivers; silicon carbide diodes, 
MOSEFTs, and modules; and voltage regulators for use in assistance and safety systems, comfort electronics, 
infotainment, powertrain, and security products. Read MoreGet a free copy of the StockNews.com research report 
on Infineon Technologies (IFNNY)[2]Shopify Stock Price Surges as Losses Narrow, Investments Pay Off[4]Will

Short Interest in Callinex Mines Inc. (OTCMKTS:CLLXF) Drops By 48.0%
Short Interest in Callinex Mines Inc. (OTCMKTS:CLLXF) Drops By 48.0%
Newstex Blogs 
Transcript Daily
October 29, 2022 Saturday 7:11 PM EST
Copyright 2022 Newstex LLC All Rights Reserved
Length: 396 words
Body
Oct 29, 2022( Transcript Daily: https://transcriptdaily.com Delivered by Newstex)  
 Callinex Mines Inc. (OTCMKTS:CLLXF[1] - Get Rating[2]) was the recipient of a large drop in short interest during 
the month of October. 
As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 5,200 shares, a drop of 48.0% from the September 30th total 
of 10,000 shares. Based on an average daily trading volume, of 11,600 shares, the short-interest ratio is currently 
0.4 days. Callinex Mines Price Performance OTCMKTS CLLXF[3] traded down $0.04 on Friday, hitting $1.65. 836 
shares of the company traded hands, compared to its average volume of 11,605. The business's 50 day moving 
average price is $1.76 and its 200-day moving average price is $1.74. Callinex Mines has a 52-week low of $1.13 
and a 52-week high of $2.91. About Callinex Mines (Get Rating[2]) Callinex Mines Inc engages in the acquisition, 
exploration, and development of mineral properties in Canada. It explores for copper, zinc, gold, and silver ores. 
The company's flagship project is the Nash Creek property that covers an area of 3,320 meters located in 
Restigouche County in northeast New Brunswick. See AlsoGet a free copy of the StockNews.com research report

Covestro (ETR:1COV) PT Set at €32.00 by UBS Group
Covestro (ETR:1COV) PT Set at €32.00 by UBS Group
Newstex Blogs 
DailyPolitical
October 29, 2022 Saturday 6:15 AM EST
Copyright 2022 Newstex LLC All Rights Reserved
Length: 544 words
Body
Oct 28, 2022( DailyPolitical: http://www.dailypolitical.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 https://www.marketbeat.com/logos/covestro-ag-logo.pngUBS Group set a €32.00 ($32.65) price target on Covestro 
(ETR:1COV[1] - Get Rating[2]) in a research report report published on Tuesday morning, Borsen Zeitung[3] 
reports. 
Several other equities analysts have also recently weighed in on 1COV. Baader Bank set a €41.00 ($41.84) target 
price on Covestro in a research note on Tuesday, October 18th. Barclays set a €57.00 ($58.16) price target on 
Covestro in a research note on Thursday, October 20th. Jefferies Financial Group set a €40.00 ($40.82) price target 
on Covestro in a research note on Tuesday. JPMorgan Chase & Co. set a €40.00 ($40.82) price target on Covestro 
in a research note on Tuesday, October 11th. Finally, The Goldman Sachs Group set a €44.00 ($44.90) price target 
on Covestro in a research note on Tuesday. Covestro Trading Down 1.7 % ETR:1COV[4] opened at €34.58 
($35.29) on Tuesday. The company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 36.57, a current ratio of 1.79 and a quick ratio of 
0.89. Covestro has a fifty-two week low of €27.69 ($28.26) and a fifty-two week high of €58.48 ($59.67). The stock's 
50-day moving average is €31.39 and its two-hundred day moving average is €35.34. The stock has a market cap 
of $6.68 billion and a PE ratio of 4.88. Covestro Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) Covestro AG supplies high-tech 
polymer materials and related application solutions. It operates in two segments, Performance Materials, and 
Solutions & Specialties. The Performance Materials segment develops, produces, and supplies high-performance 
materials, such as polyurethanes and polycarbonates, and base chemicals, which include diphenylmethane 
diisocyanate (MDI), toluylene diisocyanate, long-chain polyols, and polycarbonate resins for use in furniture and 
wood processing, construction, automotive, and transportation industries, as well as roof structures, insulation for 
buildings and refrigerators, mattresses, car seats, and other applications. See AlsoMarketBeat: Week in Review 
10/24-10/28[5]McDonalds Stock Sizzles, but Will it Hit a New All-Time High?[6]Why is Amazon Stock Falling? Is the 
Sell-Off Overdone?[7]Apple Inc. Stock Q4 Results Beat Negative Outlook, Stock Rises[8]Will Ryanair Stock Gains, 
Strong Estimates Help it Fly?[9]

Performance 
Goldrich Mining Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) Goldrich Mining Company, an exploration stage company, 
acquires and explores for mineral properties in the Americas. The company primarily explores for gold and 
associated base, and precious metals. Its mineral properties include the Chandalar property consisting of 426.5 
acres as twenty-one federal lode claims, one patented federal placer claim, and one patented federal mill site and

Nickel Creek Platinum Corp. (OTCMKTS:NCPCF) Short Interest Up 971.7% in October

October

Body
Oct 28, 2022( DailyPolitical: http://www.dailypolitical.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 Nickel Creek Platinum Corp. (OTCMKTS:NCPCF[1] - Get Rating[2]) was the recipient of a large growth in short 
interest in October. 
As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 113,600 shares, a growth of 971.7% from the September 30th 
total of 10,600 shares. Based on an average daily volume of 255,200 shares, the short-interest ratio is currently 0.4 
days. Nickel Creek Platinum Trading Down 2.5 % NCPCF stock[3] traded down $0.00 during midday trading on 
Friday, reaching $0.03. 5,700 shares of the company's stock traded hands, compared to its average volume of 
103,945. The company has a 50-day simple moving average of $0.04 and a two-hundred day simple moving 
average of $0.05. Nickel Creek Platinum has a 1-year low of $0.03 and a 1-year high of $0.13. Nickel Creek 
Platinum Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) Nickel Creek Platinum Corp. engages in the exploration, evaluation, and 
development of nickel and platinum group metals in North America. The company also explores for copper, cobalt, 
palladium, and gold deposits. Its flagship asset is its 100% owned Nickel Sh€w project that consists of 711 mineral 
claims covering an area of approximately 13,279 hectares and 91 quartz mining leases covering an area of 
approximately 1,371 hectares located in the southwestern Yukon Territory, Canada. Featured StoriesGet a free

Evoke Wealth LLC Sells 718 Shares of iShares Core S&P Total U.S. Stock Market ETF (NYSEARCA:ITOT)
Evoke Wealth LLC Sells 718 Shares of iShares Core S&P Total U.S. Stock 
Market ETF (NYSEARCA:ITOT)
Newstex Blogs 
Transcript Daily
October 29, 2022 Saturday 7:11 PM EST
Copyright 2022 Newstex LLC All Rights Reserved
Length: 527 words
Body
Oct 29, 2022( Transcript Daily: https://transcriptdaily.com Delivered by Newstex)  
 Evoke Wealth LLC trimmed its stake in iShares Core S&P Total U.S. Stock Market ETF (NYSEARCA:ITOT[1] - Get 
Rating[2]) by 4.0% in the 2nd quarter, HoldingsChannel[3] reports. The fund owned 17,068 shares of the company's 
stock after selling 718 shares during the quarter. Evoke Wealth LLC's holdings in iShares Core S&P Total U.S. 
Stock Market ETF were worth $1,430,000 as of its most recent SEC filing.  
Other hedge funds also recently added to or reduced their stakes in the company. Tcwp LLC acquired a new 
position in iShares Core S&P Total U.S. Stock Market ETF during the 1st quarter valued at about $25,000. Trust 
Co. of Vermont acquired a new position in iShares Core S&P Total U.S. Stock Market ETF during the 2nd quarter 
valued at about $30,000. OLD Second National Bank of Aurora acquired a new position in iShares Core S&P Total 
U.S. Stock Market ETF during the 1st quarter valued at about $47,000. S.A. Mason LLC acquired a new position in 
iShares Core S&P Total U.S. Stock Market ETF during the 1st quarter valued at about $60,000. Finally, Venture 
Visionary Partners LLC acquired a new position in iShares Core S&P Total U.S. Stock Market ETF during the 2nd 
quarter valued at about $78,000. iShares Core S&P Total U.S. Stock Market ETF Stock Up 2.3 % Shares of 
NYSEARCA:ITOT[4] opened at $86.53 on Friday. The business's 50-day moving average is $85.23 and its 200 day 
moving average is $88.19. iShares Core S&P Total U.S. Stock Market ETF has a 1 year low of $77.44 and a 1 year 
high of $108.15.

 Chicago Partners Investment Group LLC raised its holdings in Dimensional Emerging Core Equity Market ETF 
(NYSEARCA:DFAE[1] - Get Rating[2]) by 31.5% during the second quarter, according to its most recent filing with 
the Securities & Exchange Commission. The fund owned 177,678 shares of the company's stock after buying an 
additional 42,552 shares during the quarter. Chicago Partners Investment Group LLC owned 0.31% of Dimensional 
Emerging Core Equity Market ETF worth $4,099,000 at the end of the most recent quarter.

Body
Oct 29, 2022( Ticker Report: http://www.tickerreport.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 Advaxis, Inc. (OTCMKTS:ADXS[1] - Get Rating[2]) was the target of a significant decrease in short interest in the 
month of October. As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 2,700 shares, a decrease of 20.6% from the 
September 30th total of 3,400 shares. Based on an average daily volume of 4,200 shares, the days-to-cover ratio is 
presently 0.6 days. Advaxis Stock Performance Shares of OTCMKTS:ADXS[3] opened at $2.03 on Friday. The 
stock has a market capitalization of $3.69 million, a price-to-earnings ratio of -20.30 and a beta of 2.07. Advaxis has 
a 1-year low of $1.02 and a 1-year high of $43.20. The company's fifty day moving average is $2.14 and its two-
hundred day moving average is $3.06.  
Advaxis (OTCMKTS:ADXS[1] - Get Rating[2]) last issued its earnings results on Monday, September 12th. The 
biotechnology company reported ($3.83) earnings per share for the quarter. Analyst Ratings Changes Separately, 
StockNews.com[2] began coverage on shares of Advaxis in a research note on Tuesday, October 11th. They 
issued a "sell" rating for the company. About Advaxis (Get Rating[2]) Advaxis, Inc, a clinical-stage biotechnology 
company, focuses on the discovery, development, and commercialization of proprietary Listeria monocytogenes 
(Lm) technology antigen delivery products in the United States. The company is developing ADXS-PSA, which is in 
Phase 2 clinical trials for the treatment of metastatic prostate cancer; ADXS-503 that is in Phase 1/2 clinical trials 
for the treatment of non-small cell lung cancer; and ADXS-504 for the treatment of prostate cancer. Further

Target from Brokerages
Newstex Blogs 
Zolmax.com
October 29, 2022 Saturday 6:05 AM EST
Copyright 2022 Newstex LLC All Rights Reserved
Length: 543 words
Body
Oct 29, 2022( Zolmax.com: http://www.zolmax.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 Shares of Aecon Group Inc. (OTCMKTS:AEGXF[1] - Get Rating[2]) have received a consensus rating of "Hold" 
from the eleven brokerages that are presently covering the stock, MarketBeat.com[3] reports. Three investment 
analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and two have issued a buy rating on the company. The average 1 
year target price among brokers that have issued ratings on the stock in the last year is $14.67.  
A number of analysts recently weighed in on AEGXF shares. TD Securities decreased their target price on shares 
of Aecon Group from C$12.50 to C$12.00 in a report on Friday. FIX cut shares of Aecon Group from a "buy" rating 
to a "hold" rating and dropped their price target for the company from C$20.00 to C$11.00 in a research report on 
Monday, August 1st. Canaccord Genuity Group dropped their price target on shares of Aecon Group from C$11.00 
to C$10.00 in a research report on Monday, October 24th. Stifel Nicolaus dropped their price target on shares of 
Aecon Group from C$14.00 to C$11.00 in a research report on Tuesday, August 2nd. Finally, Raymond James 
dropped their target price on shares of Aecon Group from C$21.00 to C$17.00 in a research report on Tuesday, 
August 2nd. Aecon Group Price Performance OTCMKTS AEGXF[4] opened at $7.77 on Wednesday. The 
company's 50 day moving average is $7.85 and its 200-day moving average is $9.61. Aecon Group has a 12-month 
low of $6.78 and a 12-month high of $16.40. About Aecon Group (Get Rating[2]) Aecon Group Inc, together with its 
subsidiaries, provide construction and infrastructure development services to private and public sector clients in 
Canada, the United States, and internationally. It operates through two segments, Construction and Concessions. 
The Construction segment focuses primarily on the civil infrastructure, urban transportation systems, nuclear power 
infrastructure, utility infrastructure, and conventional industrial infrastructure market sectors. See AlsoGet a free
