Day Moving Average of $896.32
Newstex Blogs 
Transcript Daily
October 28, 2022 Friday 10:11 PM EST
Copyright 2022 Newstex LLC All Rights Reserved
Length: 468 words
Body
Oct 28, 2022( Transcript Daily: https://transcriptdaily.com Delivered by Newstex)  
 The Scottish Investment Trust PLC (LON:SCIN[1] - Get Rating[2])'s share price crossed below its 50 day moving 
average during trading on Wednesday . The stock has a 50 day moving average of GBX 896.32 ($10.83) and 
traded as low as GBX 882.07 ($10.66). The Scottish Investment Trust shares last traded at GBX 895 ($10.81), with 
a volume of 35,892 shares traded. The Scottish Investment Trust Stock Performance The company has a debt-to-
equity ratio of 13.72, a current ratio of 10.35 and a quick ratio of 10.04. The firm has a fifty day simple moving 
average of GBX 896.16 and a 200 day simple moving average of GBX 862.29. The company has a market 
capitalization of 592.25 million and a price-to-earnings ratio of 1,570.18. The Scottish Investment Trust Increases 
Dividend The company also recently disclosed a dividend, which was paid on Tuesday, August 30th. 
Investors of record on Thursday, August 18th were given a dividend of GBX 9.40 ($0.11) per share. This is a boost 
from The Scottish Investment Trust's previous dividend of $6.10. This represents a yield of 1.07%. The ex-dividend 
date was Thursday, August 18th. The Scottish Investment Trust's dividend payout ratio (DPR) is presently 43.33%. 
About The Scottish Investment Trust (Get Rating[2]) The Scottish Investment Trust PLC is a publicly owned 
investment manager. The firm manages separate client-focused equity portfolios. It invests in public equity markets 
across the globe. It employs a fundamental analysis with a bottom-up stock picking approach. The Scottish 
Investment Trust PLC was founded in 1887 and is based in Edinburgh, United Kingdom. Featured

 Hyundai Motor (OTCMKTS:HYMTF[1] - Get Rating[2]) was the target of a large growth in short interest in October. 
As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 58,100 shares, a growth of 128.7% from the September 30th 
total of 25,400 shares. Based on an average trading volume of 41,200 shares, the short-interest ratio is currently 
1.4 days. Hyundai Motor Stock Performance Shares of OTCMKTS HYMTF[3] traded down $0.05 during trading 
hours on Friday, hitting $27.10. 4,922 shares of the stock were exchanged, compared to its average volume of 
5,518. The company's fifty day simple moving average is $31.51 and its two-hundred day simple moving average is 
$34.20. Hyundai Motor has a 1-year low of $25.56 and a 1-year high of $43.00. About Hyundai Motor (Get 
Rating[2]) Hyundai Motor Co, Ltd. engages in the manufacture and distribution of motor vehicles and parts. It 
operates through the following business areas: Vehicle, Financial and Others. The Vehicle division offers motor 
vehicles. The Financial division provides financing, leasing and credit cards. The Other division includes 
manufacture of railways. Featured ArticlesGet a free copy of the StockNews.com research report on Hyundai Motor

 Shares of Anglo Pacific Group plc (TSE:APY[1] - Get Rating[2]) crossed below its 50 day moving average during 
trading on Wednesday . The stock has a 50 day moving average of C$2.42 and traded as low as C$2.20. Anglo 
Pacific Group shares last traded at C$2.22, with a volume of 7,601 shares traded. 
Anglo Pacific Group Price Performance The company's 50-day moving average price is C$2.42 and its 200-day 
moving average price is C$2.57. The company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 9.70, a current ratio of 2.46 and a quick 
ratio of 2.08. The company has a market cap of C$631.75 million and a P/E ratio of 2.88. Anglo Pacific Group 
Announces Dividend The business also recently disclosed a quarterly dividend, which was paid on Wednesday, 
October 26th. Stockholders of record on Wednesday, October 26th were given a dividend of $0.0175 per share. 
This represents a $0.07 annualized dividend and a dividend yield of 2.86%. The ex-dividend date of this dividend 
was Thursday, October 6th. Anglo Pacific Group's dividend payout ratio is 19.52%. Anglo Pacific Group Company 
Profile (Get Rating[2]) Anglo Pacific Group plc operates as a natural resources royalty and streaming company. The 
company has royalties and investments in mining and exploration interests in cobalt, coking coal, iron ore, copper, 
vanadium, uranium, and gold primarily in Australia, North and South America, and Europe. Anglo Pacific Group plc 
was incorporated in 1967 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom. Further ReadingMcDonalds Stock

in October

Body
Oct 28, 2022( Transcript Daily: https://transcriptdaily.com Delivered by Newstex)  
 New Concept Energy, Inc. (NYSEAMERICAN:GBR[1] - Get Rating[2]) was the recipient of a significant growth in 
short interest in October. As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 30,700 shares, a growth of 111.7% 
from the September 30th total of 14,500 shares. Based on an average daily volume of 176,300 shares, the days-to-
cover ratio is currently 0.2 days. Currently, 0.8% of the shares of the stock are sold short. New Concept Energy 
Trading Down 1.6 % Shares of GBR[3] traded down $0.02 during trading hours on Friday, hitting $1.27. 100 shares 
of the stock were exchanged, compared to its average volume of 367,641. New Concept Energy has a 12-month 
low of $1.04 and a 12-month high of $6.25.  
New Concept Energy (NYSEAMERICAN:GBR[1] - Get Rating[2]) last released its quarterly earnings data on 
Wednesday, August 10th. The company reported $0.02 earnings per share for the quarter. The company had 
revenue of $0.05 million for the quarter. New Concept Energy had a return on equity of 1.75% and a net margin of 
87.13%. Hedge Funds Weigh In On New Concept Energy An institutional investor recently bought a new position in 
New Concept Energy stock. Renaissance Technologies LLC bought a new position in shares of New Concept 
Energy, Inc. (NYSEAMERICAN:GBR[1] - Get Rating[2]) during the 2nd quarter, according to the company in its 
most recent Form 13F filing with the SEC. The institutional investor bought 19,200 shares of the company's stock, 
valued at approximately $30,000. Renaissance Technologies LLC owned approximately 0.37% of New Concept 
Energy at the end of the most recent quarter. Institutional investors own 6.83% of the company's stock. New 
Concept Energy Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) New Concept Energy, Inc engages in real estate rental business. 
The company owns approximately 190 acres of land located in Parkersburg West Virginia. It also provides advisory 
and management services for an independent oil and gas company. The company was formerly known as CabelTel 
International Corporation and changed its name to New Concept Energy, Inc in May 2008. Further ReadingGet a

50-day moving average during trading on Wednesday . The stock has a 50-day moving average of GBX 764.46 
($9.24) and traded as low as GBX 720.93 ($8.71). The Henderson Smaller Companies Investment Trust shares last 
traded at GBX 757 ($9.15), with a volume of 107,322 shares traded. The Henderson Smaller Companies 
Investment Trust Price Performance The company has a 50-day moving average of GBX 761.71 and a 200 day

company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 12.46, a quick ratio of 0.25 and a current ratio of 0.25. The Henderson 
Smaller Companies Investment Trust Increases Dividend The firm also recently declared a dividend, which was 
paid on Monday, October 10th.

a yield of 1.92%. This is a boost from The Henderson Smaller Companies Investment Trust's previous dividend of 
$7.00. The ex-dividend date was Thursday, August 25th. The Henderson Smaller Companies Investment Trust's 
dividend payout ratio (DPR) is currently 8.11%. Insider Buying and Selling at The Henderson Smaller Companies

transaction of 13,680 ($16,529.72). About The Henderson Smaller Companies Investment Trust (Get Rating[2]) The 
Henderson Smaller Companies Investment Trust plc is a closed-ended equity mutual fund launched and managed 
by Henderson Investment Funds Limited. It is co-managed by Henderson Global Investors Limited. The fund 
invests in the public equity markets of the United Kingdom. It seeks to invest in stocks of companies operating

on Wednesday . The stock traded as low as $26.69 and last traded at $26.94. Approximately 505,980 shares 
traded hands during trading, a decline of 7% from the average daily volume of 545,414 shares. The stock had 
previously closed at $27.52. WisdomTree Cloud Computing Fund Stock Performance The business has a 50 day 
moving average price of $28.02 and a 200-day moving average price of $30.15. Institutional Investors Weigh In On

holdings of the stock. 
Newbridge Financial Services Group Inc. boosted its position in WisdomTree Cloud Computing Fund by 40.5% 
during the first quarter. Newbridge Financial Services Group Inc. now owns 999 shares of the company's stock 
worth $41,000 after acquiring an additional 288 shares during the last quarter. SeaCrest Wealth Management LLC 
acquired a new stake in shares of WisdomTree Cloud Computing Fund during the second quarter worth $41,000.

421.7% in the second quarter. North Star Investment Management Corp. now owns 1,565 shares of the company's 
stock valued at $44,000 after purchasing an additional 1,265 shares during the period. Activest Wealth 
Management acquired a new position in WisdomTree Cloud Computing Fund in the third quarter valued at $49,000.

first quarter. BDO Wealth Advisors LLC now owns 1,652 shares of the company's stock worth $68,000 after buying 
an additional 345 shares during the period.

Newstex Blogs 
DailyPolitical
October 28, 2022 Friday 6:15 PM EST
Copyright 2022 Newstex LLC All Rights Reserved
Length: 570 words
Body
Oct 28, 2022( DailyPolitical: http://www.dailypolitical.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 The Weir Group PLC (OTCMKTS:WEGRY[1] - Get Rating[2]) was the target of a significant increase in short 
interest in the month of October. As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 22,000 shares, an increase of 
22.2% from the September 30th total of 18,000 shares. 
Based on an average daily volume of 19,700 shares, the short-interest ratio is presently 1.1 days. The Weir Group 
Stock Performance Shares of WEGRY[3] traded down $0.09 during trading hours on Friday, hitting $8.87. The 
stock had a trading volume of 5,834 shares, compared to its average volume of 29,667. The firm has a 50-day 
moving average price of $8.39 and a 200 day moving average price of $9.03. The Weir Group has a fifty-two week 
low of $7.51 and a fifty-two week high of $12.97. The Weir Group Increases Dividend The firm also recently 
announced a dividend, which will be paid on Monday, November 7th. Stockholders of record on Friday, October 7th 
will be given a dividend of $0.0668 per share. The ex-dividend date is Thursday, October 6th. This is a positive 
change from The Weir Group's previous dividend of $0.07. This represents a dividend yield of 1.66%. Wall Street 
Analyst Weigh In A number of research analysts have recently commented on WEGRY shares. Citigroup increased 
their price target on The Weir Group from GBX 1,520 ($18.37) to GBX 1,580 ($19.09) in a research note on Friday, 
July 29th. Royal Bank of Canada lifted their price objective on shares of The Weir Group from GBX 2,000 ($24.17) 
to GBX 2,275 ($27.49) in a research note on Friday, July 29th. Finally, JPMorgan Chase & Co. boosted their price 
target on shares of The Weir Group from GBX 1,650 ($19.94) to GBX 1,900 ($22.96) in a research report on Friday, 
July 29th. The Weir Group Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) The Weir Group PLC produces and sells highly 
engineered original equipment worldwide. It operates in two segments, Minerals and ESCO. The Minerals segment 
offers slurry handling equipment and associated aftermarket support services for abrasive high-wear applications 
used in the mining and oil sands markets. Recommended StoriesGet a free copy of the StockNews.com research

October. As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 81,300 shares, a growth of 31.8% from the 
September 30th total of 61,700 shares. Based on an average daily trading volume, of 303,500 shares, the days-to-
cover ratio is presently 0.3 days. Basanite Stock Up 2.0 % Shares of OTCMKTS BASA[3] traded up $0.00 on

of 235,100. Basanite has a 12-month low of $0.08 and a 12-month high of $0.29. The stock has a 50 day moving 
average of $0.11 and a 200-day moving average of $0.13.

The company reported ($0.01) EPS for the quarter. The firm had revenue of $0.29 million for the quarter. Basanite 
Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) Basanite, Inc engages in the basalt fiber reinforced polymer (FRP) business 
worldwide. It produces basalt FRP products that are used as replacement for other FRP rebar and industry fiber 
products, as wells as steel reinforcement. The company was formerly known as PayMeOn, Inc and changed its

high as $2.34 and last traded at $2.34. Approximately 100 shares changed hands during mid-day trading, a decline 
of 73% from the average daily volume of 369 shares. The stock had previously closed at $2.25. KLDiscovery Stock

average of $4.68. The company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 9.93, a current ratio of 4.06 and a quick ratio of 4.06.

equity of 47.84% and a negative net margin of 17.98%. The business had revenue of $75.19 million during the 
quarter. KLDiscovery Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) KLDiscovery Inc provides eDiscovery, information 
governance, and data recovery solutions to corporations, law firms, government agencies, and individual 
consumers worldwide. The company offers eDiscovery solutions, including Nebula Ecosystem, an information 
governance and eDiscovery platform, which helps to facilitate the identification, preservation, collection, processing, 
review, and exchange of electronically stored information (ESI); eDiscovery.com Review, a platform used to search,

Redwood Financial Network Corp Purchases 9,321 Shares of Invesco 
BulletShares 2025 Corporate Bond ETF (NYSEARCA:BSCP)
Newstex Blogs 
DailyPolitical
October 28, 2022 Friday 7:20 PM EST
Copyright 2022 Newstex LLC All Rights Reserved
Length: 621 words
Body
Oct 28, 2022( DailyPolitical: http://www.dailypolitical.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 Redwood Financial Network Corp lifted its position in shares of Invesco BulletShares 2025 Corporate Bond ETF 
(NYSEARCA:BSCP[1] - Get Rating[2]) by 13.1% during the second quarter, according to the company in its most 
recent Form 13F filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission. The institutional investor owned 80,266 
shares of the company's stock after purchasing an additional 9,321 shares during the period. Invesco BulletShares 
2025 Corporate Bond ETF comprises 1.8% of Redwood Financial Network Corp's portfolio, making the stock its 8th 
largest position. Redwood Financial Network Corp's holdings in Invesco BulletShares 2025 Corporate Bond ETF 
were worth $1,641,000 at the end of the most recent reporting period.  
A number of other institutional investors have also made changes to their positions in the company. CWM LLC 
acquired a new stake in Invesco BulletShares 2025 Corporate Bond ETF in the second quarter valued at $34,000. 
GHP Investment Advisors Inc. acquired a new stake in Invesco BulletShares 2025 Corporate Bond ETF in the first 
quarter valued at $38,000. Rosenberg Matthew Hamilton acquired a new stake in Invesco BulletShares 2025 
Corporate Bond ETF in the second quarter valued at $41,000. Independence Bank of Kentucky raised its holdings 
in Invesco BulletShares 2025 Corporate Bond ETF by 17.8% in the second quarter. Independence Bank of 
Kentucky now owns 3,770 shares of the company's stock valued at $77,000 after acquiring an additional 570 
shares in the last quarter. Finally, BNP Paribas Arbitrage SA acquired a new stake in Invesco BulletShares 2025 
Corporate Bond ETF in the first quarter valued at $104,000. Invesco BulletShares 2025 Corporate Bond ETF 
Trading Down 0.1 % BSCP[3] traded down $0.01 during trading on Friday, hitting $19.92. The company had a 
trading volume of 1,089 shares, compared to its average volume of 463,047. The business has a 50-day moving 
average of $20.13 and a 200-day moving average of $20.41. Invesco BulletShares 2025 Corporate Bond ETF has 
a 1-year low of $19.74 and a 1-year high of $22.15.

 Delivery Hero (ETR:DHER[1] - Get Rating[2]) has been assigned a €75.00 ($76.53) target price by equities 
researchers at Royal Bank of Canada in a research note issued on Friday, Borsen Zeitung[3] reports. Royal Bank of 
Canada's price target points to a potential upside of 119.68% from the company's previous close. 
Other equities analysts have also recently issued reports about the company. Jefferies Financial Group set a 
€95.00 ($96.94) target price on Delivery Hero in a report on Monday, August 22nd. Sanford C. Bernstein set a 
€61.00 ($62.24) price objective on Delivery Hero in a research note on Thursday, October 20th. Barclays set a 
€68.50 ($69.90) price objective on Delivery Hero in a research note on Tuesday, October 11th. Deutsche Bank 
Aktiengesellschaft set a €45.00 ($45.92) price objective on Delivery Hero in a research note on Monday, July 25th.

Wednesday, September 28th. Delivery Hero Trading Down 8.1 % Shares of Delivery Hero stock[4] traded down

compared to its average volume of 283,556. The company has a market capitalization of $8.66 billion and a P/E 
ratio of -7.63. Delivery Hero has a 52 week low of €23.88 ($24.37) and a 52 week high of €131.50 ($134.18). The 
firm's 50-day moving average is €40.74 and its two-hundred day moving average is €38.63. The company has a 
debt-to-equity ratio of 125.01, a quick ratio of 1.90 and a current ratio of 2.19. Delivery Hero Company Profile (Get 
Rating[2]) Delivery Hero SE offers online food ordering and delivery services. It operates approximately in 50 
countries in Europe, the Middle East, North Africa, Asia, and the Americas. The company was founded in 2011 and

Waterdrop ( NYSE :WDH) Shares Gap Down to $1.42
Waterdrop (NYSE:WDH) Shares Gap Down to $1.42
Newstex Blogs 
DailyPolitical
October 28, 2022 Friday 4:20 PM EST
Copyright 2022 Newstex LLC All Rights Reserved
Length: 566 words
Body
Oct 28, 2022( DailyPolitical: http://www.dailypolitical.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 Waterdrop Inc. (NYSE:WDH[1] - Get Rating[2])'s share price gapped down prior to trading on Friday . The stock 
had previously closed at $1.42, but opened at $1.35. Waterdrop shares last traded at $1.35, with a volume of 1 
shares traded. Analyst Ratings Changes Separately, Morgan Stanley upgraded shares of Waterdrop from an "equal 
weight" rating to an "overweight" rating and increased their price target for the stock from $2.00 to $2.10 in a 
research note on Friday, September 16th. Waterdrop Trading Up 0.7 % The company's 50 day moving average is 
$1.17 and its 200-day moving average is $1.25. The company has a market capitalization of $5.64 billion, a P/E 
ratio of -14.20, a price-to-earnings-growth ratio of 9.44 and a beta of -0.90.  
Waterdrop (NYSE:WDH[1] - Get Rating[2]) last released its quarterly earnings data on Friday, September 9th. The 
company reported $0.08 earnings per share for the quarter. Waterdrop had a negative net margin of 8.93% and a 
negative return on equity of 5.93%. The business had revenue of $104.72 million during the quarter. Analysts 
predict that Waterdrop Inc. will post 0.12 EPS for the current fiscal year. Hedge Funds Weigh In On Waterdrop A 
hedge fund recently raised its stake in Waterdrop stock. Renaissance Technologies LLC increased its holdings in 
Waterdrop Inc. (NYSE:WDH[1] - Get Rating[2]) by 175.8% during the second quarter, according to the company in 
its most recent disclosure with the Securities and Exchange Commission. The fund owned 74,200 shares of the

 Shares of IG Group Holdings plc (LON:IGG[1] - Get Rating[2]) passed above its two hundred day moving average 
during trading on Wednesday . The stock has a two hundred day moving average of GBX 762.09 ($9.21) and 
traded as high as GBX 799 ($9.65). IG Group shares last traded at GBX 799 ($9.65), with a volume of 1,577,652 
shares changing hands. Analyst Ratings Changes Several research firms have commented on IGG. 
Barclays reaffirmed an "overweight" rating and set a GBX 1,210 ($14.62) price objective on shares of IG Group in a 
research note on Friday, July 22nd. Shore Capital reiterated a "buy" rating on shares of IG Group in a research 
report on Thursday, September 15th. Finally, Royal Bank of Canada reiterated an "outperform" rating and set a 
GBX 1,000 ($12.08) target price on shares of IG Group in a research report on Friday, August 5th. One research 
analyst has rated the stock with a hold rating and four have issued a buy rating to the stock. Based on data from 
MarketBeat.com, IG Group has an average rating of "Moderate Buy" and an average target price of GBX 1,070 
($12.93). IG Group Trading Down 0.3 % The stock's fifty day simple moving average is GBX 785.39 and its 200-day 
simple moving average is GBX 762.33. The firm has a market cap of 3.37 billion and a PE ratio of 865.76. The 
company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 15.74, a current ratio of 2.50 and a quick ratio of 2.40. Insiders Place Their 
Bets In other IG Group news, insider Jon Noble sold 56,998 shares of the firm's stock in a transaction on Thursday, 
August 4th. The shares were sold at an average price of GBX 814 ($9.84), for a total value of 463,963.72 
($560,613.48). IG Group Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) IG Group Holdings plc engages in the online trading 
business worldwide. The company offers over-the-counter (OTC) leveraged derivatives, which include CFD 
(contracts for difference) that enable traders to take advantage of changes in an asset's price without owning the 
asset itself, as well as access to a range of risk-mitigation measures, including stops and limits, and negative-
balance protection; and spread bets and options. Read MoreMcDonalds Stock Sizzles, but Will it Hit a New All-

 Aixtron (ETR:AIXA[1] - Get Rating[2]) received a €33.00 ($33.67) price target from equities researchers at 
Deutsche Bank Aktiengesellschaft in a report released on Friday, Borsen Zeitung[3] reports. Deutsche Bank 
Aktiengesellschaft's price objective points to a potential upside of 24.53% from the stock's current price. 
A number of other analysts have also weighed in on the stock. Jefferies Financial Group set a €35.00 ($35.71) price 
objective on shares of Aixtron in a research note on Friday. Warburg Research set a €30.00 ($30.61) price 
objective on shares of Aixtron in a research note on Friday. set a €27.00 ($27.55) price objective on shares of 
Aixtron in a research note on Friday, July 29th. Finally, Berenberg Bank set a €28.00 ($28.57) price objective on 
shares of Aixtron in a research note on Tuesday, September 20th. Aixtron Stock Down 8.3 % ETR AIXA[4] traded 
down €2.41 ($2.46) during trading on Friday, reaching €26.50 ($27.04). 2,704,558 shares of the company's stock 
traded hands, compared to its average volume of 2,170,000. The company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.64, a 
current ratio of 3.53 and a quick ratio of 2.48. The firm has a market cap of $2.97 billion and a price-to-earnings 
ratio of 25.98. The company's 50 day simple moving average is €25.10 and its two-hundred day simple moving 
average is €24.63. Aixtron has a 12-month low of €15.20 ($15.51) and a 12-month high of €28.04 ($28.61). About 
Aixtron (Get Rating[2]) AIXTRON SE, together with its subsidiaries, provides deposition equipment to the 
semiconductor industry in Asia, Europe, and the Americas. It develops, produces, sells, maintains, and installs 
equipment for the deposition of semiconductor materials; and provides consulting and training, customer support, 
and peripheral equipment and services, as well as sells spare parts and services. Further ReadingApple Inc. Stock

iShares MSCI Emerging Markets ETF were worth $721,000 as of its most recent SEC filing.

and a 200-day simple moving average of $0.17. About RegeneRx Biopharmaceuticals (Get Rating[2]) RegeneRx 
Biopharmaceuticals, Inc, a biopharmaceutical company, focuses on the development of therapeutic peptide, 
thymosin beta 4, for tissue and organ protection, repair, and regeneration. The company is developing RGN-259, a 
preservative-free topical eye drop for regeneration of corneal tissues damaged by injury, disease, or other 
pathology; RGN-352, an injectable formulation to treat cardiovascular diseases, central and peripheral nervous 
system diseases, and other medical indications; and RGN-137, a topical gel for dermal wounds and reduction of 
scar tissue. Further ReadingGet a free copy of the StockNews.com research report on RegeneRx

 Danone (EPA:BN[1] - Get Rating[2]) has been given a €60.00 ($61.22) price target by stock analysts at Deutsche 
Bank Aktiengesellschaft in a note issued to investors on Friday, Borsen Zeitung[3] reports. Deutsche Bank 
Aktiengesellschaft's target price suggests a potential upside of 23.97% from the company's current price. 
Other research analysts also recently issued reports about the stock. The Goldman Sachs Group set a €49.00 
($50.00) price target on shares of Danone in a research report on Friday. Jefferies Financial Group set a €63.00 
($64.29) target price on Danone in a report on Thursday. Sanford C. Bernstein set a €59.00 ($60.20) price objective 
on Danone in a research report on Thursday. Credit Suisse Group set a €58.00 ($59.18) price target on Danone in 
a report on Tuesday, September 27th. Finally, JPMorgan Chase & Co. set a €70.00 ($71.43) target price on shares 
of Danone in a research report on Friday. Danone Stock Performance Shares of BN stock[4] traded up €0.13 
($0.13) on Friday, hitting €48.40 ($49.39). 1,726,510 shares of the stock traded hands, compared to its average 
volume of 1,940,000. The company's fifty day moving average is €49.95 and its 200 day moving average is €52.62. 
Danone has a 1-year low of €61.87 ($63.13) and a 1-year high of €72.13 ($73.60). Danone Company Profile (Get 
Rating[2]) Danone SA operates in the food and beverage industry in Europe, Noram, Latin America, the Asia 
Pacific, Africa, and the Middle East. The company operates through three segments: Essential Dairy & Plant-
Based, Specialized Nutrition, and Waters. It produces and distributes yogurts; milk products; coffee creamers, 
drinks, and beverages; plant-based products; and ice creams, desserts, and nutritional powdered protein products 
under the Actimel, Activia, Alpro, Aptamil, Danette, Danio, Danonino, evian, Nutricia, Nutrilon, Volvic, as well as 
under the licensed brands, including International Delight, Dunkin' Donuts, and Bailey's. Featured StoriesChevron

shares.

funds have recently bought and sold shares of the business. JPMorgan Chase & Co. purchased a new position in

purchased a new stake in shares of Valuence Merger Corp. I in the 2nd quarter worth approximately $112,000.

 Redwood Financial Network Corp cut its position in iShares U.S. Technology ETF (NYSEARCA:IYW[1] - Get 
Rating[2]) by 5.8% in the 2nd quarter, according to its most recent Form 13F filing with the Securities and Exchange 
Commission. The fund owned 2,775 shares of the exchange traded fund's stock after selling 171 shares during the 
quarter. Redwood Financial Network Corp's holdings in iShares U.S. Technology ETF were worth $222,000 as of 
its most recent SEC filing.  
Other large investors have also added to or reduced their stakes in the company. Central Bank & Trust Co. bought 
a new stake in shares of iShares U.S. Technology ETF in the 2nd quarter worth $28,000. Professional Financial 
Advisors LLC acquired a new stake in shares of iShares U.S. Technology ETF during the first quarter worth about 
$41,000. GHP Investment Advisors Inc. purchased a new stake in shares of iShares U.S. Technology ETF in the 
first quarter valued at approximately $41,000. Tacita Capital Inc acquired a new position in iShares U.S. 
Technology ETF during the first quarter worth $41,000. Finally, Venture Visionary Partners LLC acquired a new 
position in iShares U.S. Technology ETF during the 2nd quarter worth about $34,000. iShares U.S. Technology 
ETF Price Performance Shares of IYW[3] traded up $2.78 during mid-day trading on Friday, hitting $77.21. The 
company had a trading volume of 20,679 shares, compared to its average volume of 714,488. The business's 50-
day simple moving average is $79.42 and its 200-day simple moving average is $84.43. iShares U.S. Technology 
ETF has a 1-year low of $69.49 and a 1-year high of $118.00. iShares U.S. Technology ETF Profile (Get Rating[2]) 
iShares U.S. Technology ETF, formerly iShares Dow Jones U.S. Technology Sector Index Fund (the Fund) is a 
non-diversified fund. The Fund seeks investment results that correspond generally to the price and yield 
performance, before fees and expenses, of the Dow Jones U.S. Technology Index (the Index). Recommended

stock had previously closed at $22.92. Innovator U.S. Equity Accelerated Plus ETF - July Price Performance The

MAN GRP PLC/ADR Stock Up 1.4 % The company has a fifty day moving average of $1.79 and a two-hundred day 
moving average of $1.79. MAN GRP PLC/ADR Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) Man Group plc provides alternative 
investment management services worldwide. The company offers a range of liquid investment products and 
solutions, which include quantitative and discretionary, long only and long short, and single and multi-manager. It 
distributes its products and solutions directly to institutions; and to private investors through a network of 
intermediaries. Recommended StoriesGet a free copy of the StockNews.com research report on MAN GRP

 Neometals Ltd (OTCMKTS:RRSSF[1] - Get Rating[2])'s stock price was down 2.6% during mid-day trading on 
Wednesday . The stock traded as low as 0.69 and last traded at 0.69. Approximately 13,600 shares changed hands 
during trading, a decline of 11% from the average daily volume of 15,329 shares. 
The stock had previously closed at 0.71. Neometals Stock Performance The company has a 50 day moving 
average of 0.81 and a 200-day moving average of 0.86. Neometals Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) Neometals Ltd 
explores for mineral projects in Australia. The company operates through three segments: Lithium, 
Titanium/Vanadium, and Other. Its projects include the Lithium-ion Battery Recycling project, which recovers cobalt 
and other materials from spent and scrap lithium batteries; Vanadium Recovery project, which recovers vanadium 
pentoxide through processing of steelmaking by-products; Lithium Refinery project; and Barrambie Titanium and 
Vanadium project located in Western Australia. Further ReadingGet a free copy of the StockNews.com research

Wednesday . The stock traded as high as $9.96 and last traded at $9.96. Approximately 2,300 shares traded hands 
during mid-day trading, a decline of 47% from the average daily volume of 4,357 shares.

moving average of $9.90 and a 200 day moving average of $9.87. Institutional Inflows and Outflows Several hedge 
funds and other institutional investors have recently bought and sold shares of DISAU. Wolverine Asset 
Management LLC lifted its holdings in shares of Disruptive Acquisition Co. I by 48.9% during the second quarter.

acquiring an additional 1,767 shares during the period. Jane Street Group LLC lifted its holdings in shares of

shares of Disruptive Acquisition Co. I during the first quarter valued at $179,000. Disruptive Acquisition Co. I 
Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) Disruptive Acquisition Corporation I does not have significant operations. The 
company focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or 
similar business combination with one or more businesses. Disruptive Acquisition Corporation I was incorporated in

during trading on Wednesday . The stock has a 200-day moving average of $0.11 and traded as low as $0.09. SQI 
Diagnostics shares last traded at $0.09, with a volume of 6,000 shares. 
SQI Diagnostics Stock Up 26.2 % The business has a fifty day moving average price of $0.08 and a 200-day 
moving average price of $0.11. SQI Diagnostics Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) SQI Diagnostics Inc, a precision 
medicine company, discovers, develops, and commercializes rapid diagnostic testing services for healthcare 
providers, patients, and consumers worldwide. It also offers TOR-dx, a lung test, which enables the surgeon to 
assess the health of the donor's lung; and a COVID-19 at-home antibody test kit; the RALI-Dx, a COVID-19 severity 
triage lab test; and RALI-fast, a COVID-19 severity triage POC test. Featured StoriesGet a free copy of the

 Mattioli Woods (LON:MTW[1] - Get Rating[2])'s stock had its "buy" rating reaffirmed by research analysts at Shore 
Capital in a research note issued on Friday, Marketbeat.com[3] reports. 
Separately, Berenberg Bank reiterated a "buy" rating and issued a GBX 970 ($11.72) price objective on shares of 
Mattioli Woods in a report on Wednesday, September 14th. Mattioli Woods Stock Up 1.7 % Shares of Mattioli 
Woods stock[4] traded up GBX 10 ($0.12) on Friday, hitting GBX 600 ($7.25). 40,234 shares of the company traded 
hands, compared to its average volume of 69,147. The company has a 50-day moving average price of GBX 
636.43 and a 200 day moving average price of GBX 688.03. The company has a quick ratio of 1.94, a current ratio 
of 2.01 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 1.63. Mattioli Woods has a 12-month low of GBX 580 ($7.01) and a 12-month 
high of GBX 908 ($10.97). The company has a market cap of 306.99 million and a PE ratio of 7,500.00. Insider

stock in a transaction on Monday, October 10th. The stock was bought at an average cost of GBX 630 ($7.61) per 
share, for a total transaction of 3,603.60 ($4,354.28). About Mattioli Woods (Get Rating[2]) Mattioli Woods plc 
provides wealth management and employee benefit services in the United Kingdom. It operates through five 
segments: Pension Consultancy and Administration, Investment and Asset Management, Private Equity Asset 
Management, Property Management, and Employee Benefits. The company offers self invested personal pension 
and small self-administered pension schemes; alternative investment and fund management; and employee 
engagement, defined contribution and defined benefit pension schemes, workplace savings, healthcare,

Independence Gold (Get Rating[2]) Independence Gold Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and 
evaluation of precious metal properties in North America. It explores for gold and silver deposits. The company 
holds 100% interest in the 3Ts project comprising 15 mineral claims covering approximately 5,200 hectares located 
in the Nechako Plateau region of central British Columbia; and the Moosehorn property that consists of 82 quartz 
mining claims covering an area of approximately 1,720 hectares located in the Whitehorse mining district, Yukon.

 Internet Initiative Japan Inc. (OTCMKTS:IIJIY[1] - Get Rating[2]) was the recipient of a large growth in short interest 
in the month of October. As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 400 shares, a growth of 100.0% from 
the September 30th total of 200 shares. Based on an average daily volume of 1,400 shares, the short-interest ratio 
is currently 0.3 days. Internet Initiative Japan Price Performance Shares of Internet Initiative Japan stock[3] 
remained flat at $32.20 during trading on Friday. 249 shares of the company were exchanged, compared to its 
average volume of 540. The company has a quick ratio of 1.36, a current ratio of 1.40 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 
0.04. Internet Initiative Japan has a 52 week low of $22.51 and a 52 week high of $43.60. The company has a fifty 
day moving average price of $32.48 and a 200 day moving average price of $34.14. The company has a market 
cap of $3.01 billion, a price-to-earnings ratio of 20.77 and a beta of 0.58.  
Internet Initiative Japan (OTCMKTS:IIJIY[1] - Get Rating[2]) last released its earnings results on Thursday, August 
4th. The communications equipment provider reported $0.37 earnings per share (EPS) for the quarter. The 
company had revenue of $449.17 million for the quarter, compared to the consensus estimate of $502.48 million. 
Internet Initiative Japan had a net margin of 7.13% and a return on equity of 15.97%. Equities research analysts 
expect that Internet Initiative Japan will post 1.51 earnings per share for the current year. About Internet Initiative 
Japan (Get Rating[2]) Internet Initiative Japan Inc provides Internet connectivity, WAN, outsourcing, systems 
integration, and network-related equipment sales services in Japan. It operates through two segments, Network 
Services and Systems Integration Business, and ATM Operation Business. The company offers mobile 
communication and remote access/telework services; WAN/network services, including SDN, multi-cloud network, 
closed connection, internet VPN, SEIL, remote access, wireless LAN, and GIGA-school; leased line and broadband 
services; IIJ DNS platform, and domain name registration and maintenance services; IIJ access ID management, 
dial-up access, and IIJ IPv6 fiber access services; and security solutions for IIJ managed firewall, DDoS protection, 
and managed IPS/IDS services. Further ReadingGet a free copy of the StockNews.com research report on Internet

FTSE Developed Markets ETF (NYSEARCA:VEA)
Newstex Blogs 
DailyPolitical
October 28, 2022 Friday 4:20 PM EST
Copyright 2022 Newstex LLC All Rights Reserved
Length: 602 words
Body
Oct 28, 2022( DailyPolitical: http://www.dailypolitical.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 Texas Capital Bancshares Inc. TX grew its stake in Vanguard FTSE Developed Markets ETF (NYSEARCA:VEA[1] 
- Get Rating[2]) by 15.3% during the 2nd quarter, according to its most recent Form 13F filing with the Securities 
and Exchange Commission (SEC). The firm owned 119,446 shares of the company's stock after purchasing an 
additional 15,863 shares during the quarter. Vanguard FTSE Developed Markets ETF makes up approximately 
3.7% of Texas Capital Bancshares Inc. TX's investment portfolio, making the stock its 6th largest holding. Texas 
Capital Bancshares Inc. TX's holdings in Vanguard FTSE Developed Markets ETF were worth $4,873,000 as of its 
most recent SEC filing.  
Other hedge funds also recently modified their holdings of the company. Heritage Financial Services LLC acquired 
a new position in Vanguard FTSE Developed Markets ETF in the 2nd quarter valued at $25,000. Parkside 
Investments LLC bought a new stake in shares of Vanguard FTSE Developed Markets ETF in the first quarter 
valued at about $29,000. Sierra Capital LLC acquired a new position in shares of Vanguard FTSE Developed 
Markets ETF in the first quarter valued at about $29,000. Princeton Global Asset Management LLC bought a new 
position in Vanguard FTSE Developed Markets ETF during the first quarter worth about $30,000. Finally, Steward 
Financial Group LLC raised its stake in Vanguard FTSE Developed Markets ETF by 1,595.5% in the 2nd quarter. 
Steward Financial Group LLC now owns 746 shares of the company's stock worth $30,000 after purchasing an 
additional 702 shares in the last quarter. Vanguard FTSE Developed Markets ETF Stock Performance NYSEARCA 
VEA[3] traded up $0.02 during trading on Friday, reaching $38.61. The company's stock had a trading volume of 
296,377 shares, compared to its average volume of 20,280,707. The firm has a 50 day moving average price of 
$38.79 and a 200 day moving average price of $41.68. Vanguard FTSE Developed Markets ETF has a 12 month 
low of $35.42 and a 12 month high of $53.04.

during the month of October. 
As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 4,500 shares, a drop of 72.9% from the September 30th total 
of 16,600 shares. Based on an average trading volume of 0 shares, the short-interest ratio is currently  days. 
Analyst Ratings Changes Separately, Citigroup cut shares of Vontobel from a "neutral" rating to a "sell" rating in a 
research report on Wednesday, July 13th. Vontobel Stock Performance Shares of VONHF stock[3] remained flat at 
53.83 during trading on Friday. Vontobel has a 52 week low of 53.83 and a 52 week high of 82.40. The company 
has a 50 day moving average price of 60.26. About Vontobel (Get Rating[2]) Vontobel Holding AG provides various 
financial services to private and institutional clients. The company operates through Asset Management, Platforms 
& Services, Wealth Management, and Digital Investing segments. The Wealth Management segment offers 
managed solutions, advisory services, and investment products; and financial planning and consulting, pension 
planning, succession planning, and estate planning solutions, as well as real estate financing and Lombard loans.

Group LLC
Newstex Blogs 
DailyPolitical
October 28, 2022 Friday 7:20 PM EST
Copyright 2022 Newstex LLC All Rights Reserved
Length: 584 words
Body
Oct 28, 2022( DailyPolitical: http://www.dailypolitical.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 Retirement Group LLC increased its holdings in Schwab U.S. TIPS ETF (NYSEARCA:SCHP[1] - Get Rating[2]) by 
82.4% in the second quarter, HoldingsChannel.com[3] reports. The institutional investor owned 29,633 shares of 
the company's stock after purchasing an additional 13,383 shares during the quarter. Schwab U.S. TIPS ETF 
comprises about 0.7% of Retirement Group LLC's portfolio, making the stock its 22nd biggest holding. Retirement 
Group LLC's holdings in Schwab U.S. TIPS ETF were worth $1,654,000 at the end of the most recent reporting 
period.  
A number of other institutional investors and hedge funds have also added to or reduced their stakes in SCHP. 
Bogart Wealth LLC boosted its stake in Schwab U.S. TIPS ETF by 730.9% during the 2nd quarter. Bogart Wealth 
LLC now owns 457 shares of the company's stock valued at $25,000 after purchasing an additional 402 shares in 
the last quarter. Key Financial Inc boosted its stake in Schwab U.S. TIPS ETF by 59.0% during the 2nd quarter. 
Key Financial Inc now owns 574 shares of the company's stock valued at $32,000 after purchasing an additional 
213 shares in the last quarter. Lansing Street Advisors bought a new position in Schwab U.S. TIPS ETF during the 
1st quarter valued at $34,000. PrairieView Partners LLC bought a new position in Schwab U.S. TIPS ETF during 
the 1st quarter valued at $41,000. Finally, San Luis Wealth Advisors LLC bought a new position in Schwab U.S. 
TIPS ETF during the 1st quarter valued at $46,000. Schwab U.S. TIPS ETF Stock Performance NYSEARCA 
SCHP[4] traded down $0.07 on Friday, reaching $52.39. 64,735 shares of the stock traded hands, compared to its 
average volume of 4,310,169. Schwab U.S. TIPS ETF has a 12 month low of $51.55 and a 12 month high of 
$64.15. The firm's fifty day simple moving average is $53.67 and its 200 day simple moving average is $56.05.

Newstex Blogs

October 28, 2022 Friday 10:20 PM EST

Body
Oct 28, 2022( DailyPolitical: http://www.dailypolitical.com/ Delivered by Newstex)  
 Imperial Petroleum Inc. (NASDAQ:IMPP[1] - Get Rating[2]) was the target of a large increase in short interest in 
the month of October. As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 8,380,000 shares, an increase of 86.6% 
from the September 30th total of 4,490,000 shares. 
Based on an average daily trading volume, of 12,990,000 shares, the days-to-cover ratio is currently 0.6 days. 
Approximately 4.5% of the shares of the company are short sold. Imperial Petroleum Stock Performance Shares of 
IMPP stock[3] traded down $0.01 on Friday, hitting $0.41. The company had a trading volume of 3,636,996 shares, 
compared to its average volume of 30,576,135. The firm has a market cap of $57.93 million and a P/E ratio of -1.52. 
The company has a 50-day moving average price of $0.37 and a 200-day moving average price of $0.53. The 
company has a quick ratio of 6.74, a current ratio of 5.72 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 2.06. Imperial Petroleum has 
a twelve month low of $0.26 and a twelve month high of $9.70. Hedge Funds Weigh In On Imperial Petroleum 
Several institutional investors and hedge funds have recently modified their holdings of IMPP. Edmond DE 
Rothschild Holding S.A. acquired a new position in shares of Imperial Petroleum in the 2nd quarter valued at about 
$42,000. Advisory Services Network LLC acquired a new position in shares of Imperial Petroleum in the 2nd quarter 
valued at about $37,000. Finally, Millennium Management LLC purchased a new position in shares of Imperial 
Petroleum in the 2nd quarter valued at about $25,000. Institutional investors and hedge funds own 2.74% of the 
company's stock. Imperial Petroleum Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) Imperial Petroleum Inc provides international 
seaborne transportation services to oil producers, refineries, and commodities traders. It carries refined petroleum 
products, such as gasoline, diesel, fuel oil, and jet fuel, as well as edible oils and chemicals; and crude oils. As of 
March 29, 2022, the company owned four medium range refined petroleum product tankers and one Aframax crude 
oil tanker with a total capacity of 305,804 deadweight tons. Read MoreGet a free copy of the StockNews.com

 BYD Company Limited (OTCMKTS:BYDDY[1] - Get Rating[2]) saw a large drop in short interest in October. As of 
October 15th, there was short interest totalling 7,100 shares, a drop of 55.9% from the September 30th total of 
16,100 shares. 
Based on an average trading volume of 331,800 shares, the days-to-cover ratio is currently 0.0 days. Analyst 
Ratings Changes Separately, Barclays initiated coverage on BYD in a research report on Tuesday, September 
13th. They issued an "overweight" rating and a $40.00 target price for the company. BYD Trading Down 3.7 % 
BYDDY[3] traded down $1.78 during trading on Friday, reaching $46.49. 248,748 shares of the company's stock 
were exchanged, compared to its average volume of 180,094. The firm has a fifty day moving average price of 
$55.18 and a two-hundred day moving average price of $64.71. The stock has a market capitalization of $64.58 
billion, a PE ratio of 116.23 and a beta of 0.49. BYD has a one year low of $42.60 and a one year high of $84.88. 
BYD Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) BYD Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the 
research, development, manufacture, and sale of automobiles and related products in the People's Republic of 
China and internationally. It operates through three segments: Rechargeable Batteries and Photovoltaic Products; 
Mobile Handset Components, Assembly Service and Other Products; and Automobiles and Related Products and

Wacker Chemie (ETR:WCH) Given a €140.00 Price Target by Credit Suisse Group Analysts
Wacker Chemie (ETR:WCH) Given a €140.00 Price Target by Credit Suisse 
Group Analysts
Newstex Blogs 
Transcript Daily
October 28, 2022 Friday 4:05 PM EST
Copyright 2022 Newstex LLC All Rights Reserved
Length: 561 words
Body
Oct 28, 2022( Transcript Daily: https://transcriptdaily.com Delivered by Newstex)  
 Wacker Chemie (ETR:WCH[1] - Get Rating[2]) has been given a €140.00 ($142.86) target price by research 
analysts at Credit Suisse Group in a report issued on Friday, Borsen Zeitung[3] reports. Credit Suisse Group's 
target price would indicate a potential upside of 19.40% from the stock's current price. 
A number of other equities research analysts also recently commented on WCH. UBS Group set a €114.00 
($116.33) price objective on Wacker Chemie in a research report on Thursday. Warburg Research set a €201.00 
($205.10) price objective on Wacker Chemie in a research report on Tuesday, October 4th. Baader Bank set a 
€135.00 ($137.76) price objective on Wacker Chemie in a research report on Thursday. Berenberg Bank set a 
€155.00 ($158.16) price target on Wacker Chemie in a research report on Friday, July 29th. Finally, Barclays set a 
€180.00 ($183.67) price target on Wacker Chemie in a research report on Thursday. Wacker Chemie Price 
Performance Wacker Chemie stock[4] traded down €0.35 ($0.36) during mid-day trading on Friday, hitting €117.25 
($119.64). 160,564 shares of the company were exchanged, compared to its average volume of 218,420. The 
company has a market capitalization of $5.82 billion and a P/E ratio of 4.48. The company has a debt-to-equity ratio 
of 33.95, a current ratio of 2.33 and a quick ratio of 1.52. Wacker Chemie has a 12-month low of €98.58 ($100.59) 
and a 12-month high of €187.10 ($190.92). The business's 50 day simple moving average is €125.61 and its two-
hundred day simple moving average is €145.02. About Wacker Chemie (Get Rating[2]) Wacker Chemie AG, 
together with its subsidiaries, provides chemical products worldwide. It operates through four divisions: Wacker 
Silicones, Wacker Polymers, Wacker Biosolutions, and Wacker Polysilicon. The Wacker Silicones division offers 
silanes, siloxanes, silicone fluids, silicone emulsions, silicone elastomers, silicone resins, and pyrogenic silicas for 
use in construction, electronics, automotive, health, and renewable energy industries. Further ReadingWill Ryanair

is Amazon Stock Falling? Is the Sell-Off Overdone?[7]Apple Inc. Stock Q4 Results Beat Negative Outlook, Stock

5,186,798 shares traded.

of 2.18 and a quick ratio of 1.84. The business's fifty day simple moving average is GBX 1.85 and its 200 day 
simple moving average is GBX 1.85. The stock has a market cap of 13.39 million and a price-to-earnings ratio of -
4.63. About Scirocco Energy Plc (SOLO.L) (Get Rating[2]) Solo Oil Plc acquires a portfolio of direct and indirect 
interests in exploration, development, and production oil and gas assets primarily in Europe, Africa, and the 
Americas. The company holds 25% interest in the Ruvuma Petroleum Sharing Agreement covering an area of 
approximately 3,447 square kilometers; 8.39% interest in the Kiliwani North Development License; and 12.03%

115.2% in October
Newstex Blogs 
Transcript Daily
October 28, 2022 Friday 10:11 PM EST
Copyright 2022 Newstex LLC All Rights Reserved
Length: 623 words
Body
Oct 28, 2022( Transcript Daily: https://transcriptdaily.com Delivered by Newstex)  
 https://www.marketbeat.com/logos/generic-stocks11.jpgAxonPrime 
Infrastructure 
Acquisition 
Co. 
(NASDAQ:APMI[1] - Get Rating[2]) saw a significant growth in short interest in October. As of October 15th, there 
was short interest totalling 32,500 shares, a growth of 115.2% from the September 30th total of 15,100 shares. 
Approximately 0.3% of the shares of the stock are sold short. Based on an average daily volume of 30,700 shares, 
the short-interest ratio is presently 1.1 days. AxonPrime Infrastructure Acquisition Stock Down 0.5 % Shares of 
NASDAQ APMI[3] traded down $0.05 on Friday, hitting $9.77. The company's stock had a trading volume of 500 
shares, compared to its average volume of 21,313. AxonPrime Infrastructure Acquisition has a 12-month low of 
$9.59 and a 12-month high of $10.78. The stock has a 50 day moving average of $9.72 and a 200-day moving 
average of $9.70. Institutional Trading of AxonPrime Infrastructure Acquisition Several institutional investors and 
hedge funds have recently modified their holdings of the business. Arena Capital Advisors LLC CA purchased a 
new position in shares of AxonPrime Infrastructure Acquisition during the first quarter valued at approximately 
$14,270,000. Aristeia Capital LLC purchased a new position in AxonPrime Infrastructure Acquisition during the 
second quarter worth approximately $3,710,000. CSS LLC IL purchased a new position in AxonPrime Infrastructure 
Acquisition during the second quarter worth approximately $2,950,000. Context Capital Management LLC 
purchased a new position in AxonPrime Infrastructure Acquisition during the first quarter worth approximately 
$1,902,000. Finally, JPMorgan Chase & Co. raised its stake in AxonPrime Infrastructure Acquisition by 20.9% 
during the first quarter. JPMorgan Chase & Co. now owns 564,000 shares of the company's stock worth $5,431,000 
after purchasing an additional 97,500 shares during the period. Hedge funds and other institutional investors own 
48.60% of the company's stock. About AxonPrime Infrastructure Acquisition (Get Rating[2]) AxonPrime 
Infrastructure Acquisition Corporation does not have significant operations. It intends to effect a merger, share 
exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more 
businesses or entities. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in New York, New York. See AlsoGet a

Body
Oct 28, 2022( Transcript Daily: https://transcriptdaily.com Delivered by Newstex)  
 Shares of PT Vale Indonesia Tbk (OTCMKTS:PTNDY[1] - Get Rating[2]) shot up 1.9% on Wednesday . The stock 
traded as high as $22.24 and last traded at $22.24. 426 shares were traded during mid-day trading, a decline of 
19% from the average session volume of 523 shares. 
The stock had previously closed at $21.83. Analyst Upgrades and Downgrades Separately, JPMorgan Chase & Co. 
upgraded shares of PT Vale Indonesia Tbk from a "neutral" rating to an "overweight" rating in a research report on 
Monday, October 3rd. PT Vale Indonesia Tbk Stock Performance The business's 50-day simple moving average is 
$22.86 and its 200 day simple moving average is $22.68. About PT Vale Indonesia Tbk (Get Rating[2]) PT Vale 
Indonesia Tbk engages in the exploration and mining, processing, storage, transportation, and marketing of nickel 
and related mineral products in Indonesia, Canada, and Japan. It operates a concession area of 118,017 hectares 
located in central, south, and southeast Sulawesi. The company also explores for iron ore and pellets, nickel, 
manganese and ferroalloys, coal, and copper deposits. Read MoreGet a free copy of the StockNews.com research

average during trading on Wednesday . The stock has a two hundred day moving average of $0.00 and traded as 
high as $0.00. Tri-Tech shares last traded at $0.00, with a volume of 0 shares changing hands. Tri-Tech Price 
Performance 
Tri-Tech Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) Tri-Tech Holding Inc provides consulting, engineering, procurement, 
construction, and technical services. Its Water, Wastewater Treatment and Municipal Infrastructure segment 
procures and constructs build-transfer processing equipment and processing control systems for the municipal 
water supply and distribution, wastewater treatment, and gray water recycling activities; and offers municipal 
facilities engineering and operation management services for related infrastructure construction projects. Further

Beaumont Financial Partners LLC Cuts Stock Holdings in Invesco BulletShares 2024 Corporate Bond ETF 
(NYSEARCA:BSCO)
Beaumont Financial Partners LLC Cuts Stock Holdings in Invesco 
BulletShares 2024 Corporate Bond ETF (NYSEARCA:BSCO)
Newstex Blogs 
Transcript Daily
October 28, 2022 Friday 5:11 PM EST
Copyright 2022 Newstex LLC All Rights Reserved
Length: 667 words
Body
Oct 28, 2022( Transcript Daily: https://transcriptdaily.com Delivered by Newstex)  
 Beaumont Financial Partners LLC lowered its stake in shares of Invesco BulletShares 2024 Corporate Bond ETF 
(NYSEARCA:BSCO[1] - Get Rating[2]) by 7.1% during the second quarter, according to the company in its most 
recent disclosure with the Securities & Exchange Commission. The firm owned 100,971 shares of the company's 
stock after selling 7,684 shares during the period. Beaumont Financial Partners LLC owned approximately 0.06% of 
Invesco BulletShares 2024 Corporate Bond ETF worth $2,094,000 at the end of the most recent reporting period.  
A number of other large investors also recently bought and sold shares of BSCO. Lido Advisors LLC raised its stake 
in shares of Invesco BulletShares 2024 Corporate Bond ETF by 1,062.0% in the 1st quarter. Lido Advisors LLC 
now owns 12,635,582 shares of the company's stock valued at $266,231,000 after acquiring an additional 
11,548,138 shares during the period. Aptus Capital Advisors LLC purchased a new position in shares of Invesco 
BulletShares 2024 Corporate Bond ETF in the 2nd quarter valued at $77,784,000. Bank of America Corp DE raised 
its stake in shares of Invesco BulletShares 2024 Corporate Bond ETF by 46.7% in the 1st quarter. Bank of America 
Corp DE now owns 3,344,489 shares of the company's stock valued at $70,469,000 after acquiring an additional 
1,064,776 shares during the period. UBS Group AG grew its holdings in Invesco BulletShares 2024 Corporate Bond 
ETF by 11.4% during the 1st quarter. UBS Group AG now owns 2,124,106 shares of the company's stock valued at 
$44,755,000 after purchasing an additional 216,998 shares in the last quarter. Finally, Oakhurst Advisors LLC grew 
its holdings in Invesco BulletShares 2024 Corporate Bond ETF by 135.1% during the 1st quarter. Oakhurst 
Advisors LLC now owns 2,013,485 shares of the company's stock valued at $42,424,000 after purchasing an 
additional 1,156,947 shares in the last quarter. Invesco BulletShares 2024 Corporate Bond ETF Price Performance 
BSCO[3] traded down $0.01 during trading hours on Friday, reaching $20.36. 19,821 shares of the stock traded 
hands, compared to its average volume of 980,937. The firm's fifty day simple moving average is $20.52 and its 
two-hundred day simple moving average is $20.72. Invesco BulletShares 2024 Corporate Bond ETF has a fifty-two 
week low of $20.27 and a fifty-two week high of $22.04.

 Fidelity Magellan ETF (BATS:FMAG[1] - Get Rating[2]) was down 1.1% during mid-day trading on Wednesday .

during trading, The stock had previously closed at $18.53. Fidelity Magellan ETF Trading Down 0.6 % The 
business's 50-day moving average is $18.82 and its 200-day moving average is $19.49. Institutional Investors

AG boosted its stake in shares of Fidelity Magellan ETF by 260.3% during the 1st quarter. UBS Group AG now 
owns 4,580 shares of the company's stock worth $103,000 after purchasing an additional 3,309 shares during the

in shares of Fidelity Magellan ETF in the second quarter worth approximately $329,000. Finally, Summit X LLC 
acquired a new stake in shares of Fidelity Magellan ETF in the first quarter worth approximately $356,000.

 Sterling Energy plc (LON:SEY[1] - Get Rating[2])'s stock price crossed below its 200-day moving average during 
trading on Wednesday . The stock has a 200-day moving average of GBX 16.50 ($0.20) and traded as low as GBX 
16 ($0.19). Sterling Energy shares last traded at GBX 16.50 ($0.20), with a volume of 545,820 shares changing 
hands. 
Sterling Energy Price Performance The company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 1.23, a current ratio of 159.29 and a 
quick ratio of 159.29. The stock has a market cap of 36.31 million and a P/E ratio of -27.50. The company's 50 day 
simple moving average is GBX 16.50 and its 200 day simple moving average is GBX 16.50. About Sterling Energy 
(Get Rating[2]) Sterling Energy plc, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an upstream oil and gas company 
primarily in Africa and the Middle East. It is involved in the appraisal, exploration, development, and production of oil 
and gas. The company holds 34% interest in an exploration project covering approximately 22,840 square 
kilometers located in Somaliland. See AlsoMcDonalds Stock Sizzles, but Will it Hit a New All-Time High?[3]Chevron

 Redwood Financial Network Corp trimmed its position in ALPS Sector Dividend Dogs ETF (NYSEARCA:SDOG[1] -

Securities & Exchange Commission. The fund owned 5,571 shares of the company's stock after selling 400 shares 
during the quarter. Redwood Financial Network Corp's holdings in ALPS Sector Dividend Dogs ETF were worth 
$279,000 as of its most recent SEC filing.

during midday trading on Friday, hitting $50.25. 1 shares of the company were exchanged, compared to its average

 Deutsche Lufthansa (ETR:LHA[1] - Get Rating[2]) has been given a €7.80 ($7.96) target price by equities 
researchers at UBS Group in a research note issued on Friday, Borsen Zeitung[3] reports. UBS Group's price 
objective suggests a potential upside of 13.67% from the company's previous close. 
A number of other research firms also recently weighed in on LHA. Sanford C. Bernstein set a €4.75 ($4.85) price 
target on Deutsche Lufthansa in a research note on Thursday. The Goldman Sachs Group set a €7.70 ($7.86) price 
target on Deutsche Lufthansa in a report on Wednesday, October 19th. Finally, Deutsche Bank Aktiengesellschaft 
set a €8.50 ($8.67) target price on Deutsche Lufthansa in a report on Monday. Deutsche Lufthansa Stock 
Performance ETR:LHA[4] traded up €0.21 ($0.21) during mid-day trading on Friday, reaching €6.86 ($7.00). The 
stock had a trading volume of 7,472,430 shares, compared to its average volume of 3,430,000. Deutsche Lufthansa 
has a twelve month low of €5.24 ($5.35) and a twelve month high of €7.92 ($8.08). The business has a 50 day 
simple moving average of €6.13 and a 200 day simple moving average of €6.36. The firm has a market 
capitalization of $8.20 billion and a price-to-earnings ratio of -3.49. The company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 
198.39, a quick ratio of 0.77 and a current ratio of 0.92. Deutsche Lufthansa Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) 
Deutsche Lufthansa AG operates as an aviation company in Germany and internationally. The company's Network 
Airlines segment offers passenger services. Its Eurowings segment provides passenger services through a route 
network of more than 100 destinations in over 50 countries. The company's Logistics Business segment offers 
transport services for various cargoes, including general cargo, dangerous goods, valuables, vulnerable, 
perishables, live animals, courier, emergency, airmail/e-commerce, and temperature sensitive goods services 
approximately 300 destinations in 100 countries. Featured StoriesCan Comcast Monetize Existing Users for

of the transaction, the director now directly owns 4,522,200 shares in the company, valued at C$565,275.

 Thompson Davis & CO. Inc. lessened its holdings in iShares Floating Rate Bond ETF (BATS:FLOT[1] - Get 
Rating[2]) by 4.4% in the second quarter, according to the company in its most recent Form 13F filing with the SEC. 
The firm owned 9,259 shares of the company's stock after selling 428 shares during the quarter. Thompson Davis & 
CO. Inc.'s holdings in iShares Floating Rate Bond ETF were worth $462,000 as of its most recent SEC filing.  
A number of other institutional investors also recently modified their holdings of FLOT. Magnolia Wealth 
Management LLC bought a new position in shares of iShares Floating Rate Bond ETF in the first quarter worth 
about $1,257,679,000. Allworth Financial LP lifted its holdings in shares of iShares Floating Rate Bond ETF by 
5,186.3% in the first quarter. Allworth Financial LP now owns 8,153,890 shares of the company's stock worth 
$411,934,000 after acquiring an additional 7,999,643 shares during the last quarter. Bank of America Corp DE lifted 
its holdings in shares of iShares Floating Rate Bond ETF by 27.3% in the first quarter. Bank of America Corp DE 
now owns 12,860,587 shares of the company's stock worth $649,717,000 after acquiring an additional 2,757,400 
shares during the last quarter. Glenview Trust Co lifted its holdings in shares of iShares Floating Rate Bond ETF by 
94.7% in the first quarter. Glenview Trust Co now owns 2,641,938 shares of the company's stock worth 
$133,471,000 after acquiring an additional 1,284,733 shares during the last quarter. Finally, UBS Group AG lifted its 
holdings in shares of iShares Floating Rate Bond ETF by 40.3% in the first quarter. UBS Group AG now owns 
4,354,461 shares of the company's stock worth $219,987,000 after acquiring an additional 1,251,216 shares during 
the last quarter. iShares Floating Rate Bond ETF Stock Performance Shares of iShares Floating Rate Bond ETF 
stock[3] traded down $0.01 on Friday, hitting $50.21. The stock had a trading volume of 1,197,614 shares. The 
stock has a 50 day moving average of $50.27 and a 200 day moving average of $50.27. iShares Floating Rate 
Bond ETF has a twelve month low of $50.76 and a twelve month high of $51.10.

 https://www.marketbeat.com/logos/generic-stocks13.jpgBlack Spade Acquisition Co (NYSE:BSAQ[1] - Get 
Rating[2]) was the target of a large increase in short interest during the month of October. As of October 15th, there 
was short interest totalling 2,500 shares, an increase of 177.8% from the September 30th total of 900 shares. 
Currently, 0.0% of the shares of the company are short sold. Based on an average daily volume of 39,600 shares, 
the short-interest ratio is presently 0.1 days. Black Spade Acquisition Stock Performance NYSE:BSAQ[3] remained 
flat at $9.86 during mid-day trading on Friday. The company had a trading volume of 2,100 shares, compared to its 
average volume of 64,548. The stock's fifty day moving average price is $9.80 and its 200-day moving average 
price is $9.74. Black Spade Acquisition has a 1-year low of $9.39 and a 1-year high of $9.91.  
Black Spade Acquisition (NYSE:BSAQ[1] - Get Rating[2]) last announced its quarterly earnings data on Monday, 
August 22nd. The company reported $0.06 earnings per share for the quarter. Hedge Funds Weigh In On Black 
Spade Acquisition Hedge funds and other institutional investors have recently added to or reduced their stakes in 
the stock. Centiva Capital LP acquired a new position in Black Spade Acquisition in the 2nd quarter valued at 
$294,000. Mizuho Securities USA LLC bought a new position in shares of Black Spade Acquisition in the 3rd 
quarter valued at $314,000. Finally, Bank of America Corp DE bought a new position in shares of Black Spade 
Acquisition in the 1st quarter valued at $584,000. 47.55% of the stock is owned by institutional investors and hedge 
funds. About Black Spade Acquisition (Get Rating[2]) Black Spade Acquisition Co focuses on effecting a merger, 
share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or other business combination with one or more 
businesses. It intends to complete a business combination with companies in the entertainment industry worldwide. 
The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Central, Hong Kong. Featured StoriesGet a free copy of the

during trading on Wednesday . The stock has a fifty day moving average of GBX 9.10 ($0.11) and traded as high as 
GBX 9.10 ($0.11). Premaitha Health shares last traded at GBX 9.10 ($0.11), with a volume of 1,571,557 shares 
trading hands. 
Premaitha Health Stock Performance The stock has a 50-day simple moving average of GBX 9.10 and a 200 day 
simple moving average of GBX 9.10. About Premaitha Health (Get Rating[2]) Premaitha Health PLC, a molecular 
diagnostic company, develops tests for non-invasive prenatal screening and other applications in the United 
Kingdom and internationally. The company develops the IONA Test, an in vitro diagnostic non-invasive pre-natal 
screening test for pregnant women to estimate Down's syndrome, Edward's syndrome, and Patau's syndrome.

during the month of October.

30th total of 300 shares. Based on an average daily volume of 44,200 shares, the short-interest ratio is presently 
0.1 days. Luvu Brands Stock Performance Luvu Brands stock[3] remained flat at $0.17 during midday trading on 
Friday. 21,075 shares of the company traded hands, compared to its average volume of 52,790. Luvu Brands has a

and a beta of 2.08. The stock's fifty day moving average price is $0.11 and its 200-day moving average price is 
$0.13. The company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.61, a current ratio of 1.15 and a quick ratio of 0.41. Luvu Brands 
Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) Luvu Brands, Inc designs, manufactures, and markets various wellness, lifestyle, 
and casual seating products worldwide. The company offers Liberator, a brand category of products for enhancing 
sexual performance; and bed therapy products, assistive in relieving medical conditions associated with acid reflux, 
surgery recovery, and chronic pain under the Avana brand. Further ReadingGet a free copy of the StockNews.com

 Amplifon (OTCMKTS:AMFPF[1] - Get Rating[2]) had its price objective cut by investment analysts at Morgan 
Stanley from €29.00 ($29.59) to €28.00 ($28.57) in a report released on Friday, The Fly[3] reports. 
A number of other brokerages have also recently weighed in on AMFPF. Oddo Bhf raised Amplifon from a "neutral" 
rating to an "outperform" rating in a report on Wednesday, July 27th. Barclays began coverage on shares of 
Amplifon in a report on Tuesday, September 13th. They issued an "overweight" rating for the company. Amplifon 
Price Performance AMFPF[4] remained flat at $25.30 during trading on Friday. The business has a 50 day moving 
average of $27.81 and a 200-day moving average of $34.21. Amplifon has a fifty-two week low of $16.39 and a 
fifty-two week high of $53.33. The company has a quick ratio of 0.63, a current ratio of 0.70 and a debt-to-equity 
ratio of 1.03. The stock has a market capitalization of $5.73 billion, a P/E ratio of 27.20 and a beta of 0.55. Amplifon 
Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) Amplifon S.p.A. retails hearing care products and services that help people 
rediscover various emotions of sound. The company offers ampli-easy, ampli-mini, ampli-connect, and ampli-
energy hearing devices. It also provides fitting of customized products. As of March 18, 2022, the company 
operated a network of approximately 9,200 points of sale in 25 countries and 5 continents. Read MoreGet a free

 Stock analysts at EF Hutton Acquisition Co. I initiated coverage on shares of Amprius Technologies 
(NYSE:AMPX[1] - Get Rating[2]) in a research report issued on Friday, Stock Target Advisor[3] reports. The 
brokerage set a "buy" rating and a $14.00 price target on the stock. EF Hutton Acquisition Co. I's price objective 
would indicate a potential upside of 23.89% from the company's previous close. 
Separately, Oppenheimer initiated coverage on shares of Amprius Technologies in a research note on Thursday, 
October 13th. They issued an "outperform" rating and a $14.00 target price for the company. Amprius Technologies 
Stock Up 3.0 % Shares of NYSE:AMPX[4] traded up $0.33 during trading on Friday, reaching $11.30. 2,060 shares 
of the company were exchanged, compared to its average volume of 2,246,561. Amprius Technologies has a 12-
month low of $5.64 and a 12-month high of $26.01. Amprius Technologies Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) 
Amprius Technologies, Inc produces and sells ultra-high energy density lithium-ion batteries for mobility 
applications. The company offers silicon nanowire anode batteries for use in the aerospace, defense, and electric 
vehicle applications. Its batteries are primarily used for existing and emerging aviation applications, including 
unmanned aerial systems, such as drones and high-altitude pseudo satellites. See AlsoGet a free copy of the

 Retirement Group LLC grew its position in Schwab Intermediate-Term U.S. Treasury ETF (NYSEARCA:SCHR[1] - 
Get Rating[2]) by 284.0% during the second quarter, according to its most recent filing with the Securities and 
Exchange Commission. The institutional investor owned 19,889 shares of the company's stock after purchasing an 
additional 14,709 shares during the quarter. Retirement Group LLC's holdings in Schwab Intermediate-Term U.S. 
Treasury ETF were worth $1,026,000 at the end of the most recent reporting period.  
Other institutional investors have also modified their holdings of the company. NWK Group Inc. acquired a new 
stake in Schwab Intermediate-Term U.S. Treasury ETF in the first quarter valued at $33,000. Townsend Asset 
Management Corp NC ADV acquired a new stake in shares of Schwab Intermediate-Term U.S. Treasury ETF 
during the 2nd quarter worth about $33,000. Stonebridge Capital Advisors LLC acquired a new stake in shares of 
Schwab Intermediate-Term U.S. Treasury ETF during the 1st quarter worth about $35,000. Worth Asset 
Management LLC purchased a new stake in Schwab Intermediate-Term U.S. Treasury ETF during the first quarter 
worth approximately $41,000. Finally, Swaine & Leidel Wealth Services LLC acquired a new position in Schwab 
Intermediate-Term U.S. Treasury ETF in the first quarter valued at approximately $87,000. Schwab Intermediate-
Term U.S. Treasury ETF Stock Performance Schwab Intermediate-Term U.S. Treasury ETF stock[3] traded down 
$0.24 during mid-day trading on Friday, hitting $48.81. The company had a trading volume of 52,755 shares, 
compared to its average volume of 1,661,107. Schwab Intermediate-Term U.S. Treasury ETF has a 1 year low of 
$48.09 and a 1 year high of $56.63. The business has a fifty day moving average of $49.73 and a 200 day moving 
average of $51.02.

 https://www.marketbeat.com/logos/generic-stocks4.jpgFortress Biotech, Inc. (NASDAQ:FBIOP[1] - Get Rating[2]) 
saw a large growth in short interest in the month of October. As of October 15th, there was short interest totalling 
2,900 shares, a growth of 141.7% from the September 30th total of 1,200 shares. 
Based on an average trading volume of 9,800 shares, the days-to-cover ratio is presently 0.3 days. Insider 
Transactions at Fortress Biotech In related news, CEO Lindsay A. Md Rosenwald acquired 100,000 shares of the 
company's stock in a transaction that occurred on Friday, October 21st. The shares were acquired at an average 
price of $0.69 per share, with a total value of $69,000.00. Following the acquisition, the chief executive officer now 
owns 11,625,324 shares of the company's stock, valued at approximately $8,021,473.56. The transaction was 
disclosed in a filing with the Securities & Exchange Commission, which is accessible through the SEC website[3]. 
Fortress Biotech Price Performance FBIOP[4] traded up $0.12 during trading on Friday, reaching $19.95. 6,358 
shares of the company were exchanged, compared to its average volume of 12,629. Fortress Biotech has a 12-
month low of $16.86 and a 12-month high of $26.60. Fortress Biotech Announces Dividend The firm also recently 
declared a dividend, which will be paid on Monday, October 31st. Shareholders of record on Friday, October 14th 
will be issued a $0.1953 dividend. The ex-dividend date of this dividend is Thursday, October 13th. This represents 
a dividend yield of 11.8%. Fortress Biotech Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) Fortress Biotech, Inc, a 
biopharmaceutical company, develops and commercializes pharmaceutical and biotechnology products. The 
company markets dermatology products, such as Ximino capsules to treat only inflammatory lesions of non-nodular 
moderate to severe acne vulgaris; Targadox for severe acne; Exelderm cream for ringworm and jock itch 
symptoms; Ceracade for dry skin conditions; Luxamend for dressing and managing wounds; and Accutane 
capsules for severe recalcitrant nodular acne. Featured StoriesGet a free copy of the StockNews.com research

 LMS Capital plc (LON:LMS[1] - Get Rating[2]) was down 7.9% during trading on Wednesday . The stock traded as 
low as GBX 29 ($0.35) and last traded at GBX 29 ($0.35). Approximately 46,000 shares changed hands during mid-
day trading, an increase of 110% from the average daily volume of 21,892 shares. 
The stock had previously closed at GBX 31.50 ($0.38). LMS Capital Price Performance The firm has a fifty day 
moving average of GBX 31.03 and a 200 day moving average of GBX 32.10. The company has a market 
capitalization of 23.73 million and a P/E ratio of 1,600.00. The company has a current ratio of 0.38, a quick ratio of 
0.38 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.13. LMS Capital Cuts Dividend The firm also recently disclosed a dividend, 
which was paid on Monday, September 12th. Investors of record on Thursday, August 11th were issued a GBX 
0.30 ($0.00) dividend. The ex-dividend date was Thursday, August 11th. This represents a yield of 0.98%. LMS 
Capital's payout ratio is 46.25%. About LMS Capital (Get Rating[2]) LMS Capital plc is a private equity firm 
specializing in direct and fund of funds investments in mid ventures, late ventures, emerging growth, middle market, 
later stage, growth and development capital, buyout and recapitalization. The firm prefers to invest in media,

the exploration, development, and mineral processing activities in Mexico. The company produces silver, lead, zinc, 
gold, and copper deposits. It primarily owns interests in the Royal Mines of Zacualpan Silver-Gold District and the 
Capire Mineral District covering an area of approximately 211 square kilometers located in central Mexico. See

average of $16.84. Harvey Norman has a twelve month low of $12.00 and a twelve month high of $14.73. Harvey 
Norman Cuts Dividend The firm also recently announced a dividend, which will be paid on Tuesday, November 
29th. Shareholders of record on Friday, October 14th will be paid a $0.5496 dividend. The ex-dividend date is 
Thursday, October 13th. This represents a yield of 8.17%. About Harvey Norman (Get Rating[2]) Harvey Norman 
Holdings Limited engages in the integrated retail, franchise, property, and digital system businesses. It franchises

JPMorgan Chase & Co. Boosts Thales (OTCMKTS:THLLY) Price Target to €160.00
JPMorgan Chase & Co. Boosts Thales (OTCMKTS:THLLY) Price Target to 
€160.00
Newstex Blogs 
Transcript Daily
October 28, 2022 Friday 8:11 PM EST
Copyright 2022 Newstex LLC All Rights Reserved
Length: 552 words
Body
Oct 28, 2022( Transcript Daily: https://transcriptdaily.com Delivered by Newstex)  
 Thales (OTCMKTS:THLLY[1] - Get Rating[2]) had its target price upped by analysts at JPMorgan Chase & Co.[3] 
from €143.00 ($145.92) to €160.00 ($163.27) in a research report issued on Friday, The Fly[4] reports. 
A number of other equities research analysts also recently issued reports on the company. Societe Generale 
downgraded Thales from a "buy" rating to a "hold" rating in a research report on Thursday, September 8th. Jefferies 
Financial Group raised their price target on Thales from €135.00 ($137.76) to €140.00 ($142.86) in a research 
report on Wednesday. Two research analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and four have issued a buy 
rating to the company's stock. Based on data from MarketBeat.com, the company presently has a consensus rating 
of "Moderate Buy" and a consensus price target of $145.67. Thales Trading Down 0.5 % Shares of THLLY stock[5] 
traded down $0.12 on Friday, reaching $25.17. The company's stock had a trading volume of 31,167 shares, 
compared to its average volume of 87,973. Thales has a 12-month low of $15.69 and a 12-month high of $27.94. 
The stock's 50 day simple moving average is $23.15 and its 200-day simple moving average is $24.31. Thales 
Company Profile (Get Rating[2]) Thales SA provides various solutions for civilian and military customers in the 
aeronautics, space, defense, security, ground transportation, and digital security markets worldwide. It operates 
through Aerospace, Transport, Defence & Security, and Digital Identity & Security segments. The company offers 
communications, command, and control systems; mission services and support; protection and mission/combat 
systems; surveillance, detection, and intelligence systems; training and simulation solutions for air, land, naval, and 
joint forces; and digital identity and security solutions. Featured StoriesGet a free copy of the StockNews.com 
research report on Thales (THLLY)[2]McDonalds Stock Sizzles, but Will it Hit a New All-Time High?[6]Chevron
